title: Bionic Urban Stick Treat Dispensing Tough Dog Chew Toy
descriptions:
['There’s more than one way to have fun with the Bionic Urban Stick Dog Toy. First, you can stash your dog’s favorite treat inside and challenge him to the tastiest game of hide-and-go-seek ever, or you can just use it as a good ol’ fashioned chew toy. The supernaturally strong Bionic Rubber is made to stand up the toughest chewers, with a splinter-free design that is free from lead and BPA. It even floats and bounces, so you can have fun on dry land or in the pool on those warm days. He’ll love to chase after it wherever you are, and the choice of bright colors make it easy to spot.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Bionic
']
key_benefits: ['Treat-dispensing design holds treats on either end and gives bored dogs a mental challenge.', 'Also bounces and floats, so it’s great for fetch on dry land or in the pool, lake or ocean.', 'Choice of bright color are super easy to spot, and the soft edges are easy and safe to chew.', 'Supernaturally strong Bionic Rubber features interwoven molecules that make it durable yet pliable and bouncy.', 'Dishwasher safe and recyclable food-grade rubber is free from lead, BPA and phthalates and won’t splinter.']
reviews: [We have a 1 year old St. Bernard puppy and he has not destroyed this chew toy yet although we've had it for almost 6 months. He loves to play with it by himself just chewing on it, playing tug-a-war with other dogs or us, or parading it around like a trophy. This toy has held up better than any other chew toy and it is soft so it doesn't hurt his teeth but still exercises his chaws and teeth. We also like the bright color, which makes it easy to find when he takes it outside in the yard. We would definitely buy it again., We have a 50 lb collie mix who destroys most toys in minutes. We've had this bone for 2+ years and it's still in good shape. He chews on it almost daily, and we play tug of war with him with it and it has held up well. It doesn't get rough edges like nylon based toys, so I don't worry about it hurting his mouth and we can grip it easily. This is literally the only toy that he hasn't destroyed. Please make more like it!, My dog enjoyed a few treats and peanut butter crammed in both sides, immediately after he enjoyed the treat he started to split the ends so I took it away. Unfortunately one of the toddlers let him have it back and he's spent the last few weeks destroying it and ripping it into smaller pieces. Apparently I didn't pick up some fast enough and found them the other day after some rain in a pile in the yard. If you have a tough chewer I wouldn't get this toy, it won't last long., I bought this at a local retailer. I didn’t realize Chewy sold it. I’m so happy that they do. This toy is GREAT!! Both my 7 year old Samoyed Siberian Husky and my 9 month old Collie Pyrenees love IT!! At first I was shocked to see my Husky interacting with it. He rarely ever plays. Then I got a little worried that he was going to chew through it. But this toy is true to its name, it’s definitely bionic. My collie who normally destroys his toys after 2 days, hasn’t been able to cause any damage to this :) Also I stuff both ends with treats to keep them more engaged. But it would be nice if the depth of the toy was longer so I could stuff more treats in it., My dog Riddick really loves this treat-toy! He's been working on getting every little bit of treat crumb out of it, for a long time now and not damaging the toy itself.... so far! This is a good one!!, This toy was advertised as being good for tough chewers. It's even in the name. I bought two of them because my GSPs, one of whom is a puppy, love to chew. It took the puppy less than 10 minutes to chew through the ends of this toy. Mercifully, it looks as though she spit out the tiny pieces: I was finding them everywhere. I will never buy anything from this company again., My boy who destroys everything plays with this and has not been able to make a dent in it. He carries it around, plays tug and chews on it. It would get. 5 if it had a squeaker or made a crinkly noise, but without any noise, he loses interest in it quickly., Our pit mix loves this toy! It seems like it won't hold up forever to her chomping, so we only get it out to play fetch outside. She loves it - seemingly because it's heavy and fun to trot around with, and she clearly loves the chewy-rubbery texture too., I got this toy for my daughters dog to pay with my dog when they come to visit. My problem has been I have a small 20 lb Frenchie and she has a 50 lb active dog. When they are together, its wild times and major tug of war. Normally the larger dog destroys every toy but NOT this one. Its a good size for each of them and the perfect durability and weight for both sizes. Holds up the best of all., I have hard chewers. They don’t like the hard plastic toys and usually rip through the ‘sturdy’ rubber ones. This one has been an exception. They enjoy playing with it, especially when treats are involved, but they haven’t torn it apart yet.]

reviews: [This was the first toy we gave our Belgian Malinois puppy when we were bringing her home. It’s great. The rope is soft for her mouth and long enough for me to stand while playing (although I’m pretty short). The pickle makes a great handle for me and I’m sure she will enjoy biting it in the future when she gets bigger. As a side note, I never leave her unsupervised with this toy. I noticed the strings were pretty easy for her to pull loose if she sat and chewed on it. Still a great toy and if the rope wears out we can still use the pickle in the future., This product came up as a heavy chewer tug toy. My 10 month old destroyed it in less than 90 minutes. He and his sisters didn't even get a chance to tug with it., Not a great toy for tug of war. Played with it twice and the rope popped out of the pickle. So now we just have a pickle and a separate rope., The rope was chewed off the 1st day, but my dog still plays with the pickle a lot., I have a one year old Aussie, girl, 35 pounds . She destroyed the pickle within 30 minutes of its arrival. Don’t bother purchasing unless your pooch has no teeth., This is our dog’s favorite toy! We bought it specifically for playing fetch in the water. He’s 30 lbs and sometimes has trouble holding onto something the size of a tennis ball. He can grab onto the pickle or the rope and it’s easy for him to retrieve. He loves just chewing and playing with it inside too., My dog likes this toy a lot and I get a kick out of it too. Haven't tested if it really does float yet but we are excited to have another lake toy!, My beagle loves this toy!! The pickle came off the rope after the second day of playing, but he still loves the pickle part. He chewed off the squeaky part, and still plays with the rest of the pickle. I purchased this toy in a bundle with other toys. Not sure I would pay $9.99 for the pickle alone., Thought this would be the perfect toy for my 45 lbs, 2 yr old aussie. Nope, he just tore the rope out of it. Now its just the pickle lol he still likes playing with it, but its no longer the tug of war toy we were hoping for.]

title: Multipet Nuts For Knots Long Rope Tug & Tennis Ball Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
["Tug it, chase it, chew it! No matter what your rough-playing pal decides to do with the Multipet Nuts for Knots Long Rope Tug & Tennis Ball Dog Toy, one thing's for sure—that tail is going to wag! This extra-durable toy is paw-fect for interactive play between you and your canine companion or between her and a fellow furry friend! This Nuts for Knots toy has a long, twisted rope threaded through a vibrant tennis ball with a large knot to keep it in place for a ton of tugging fun. This toy ships in a variety of fun colors at random for a fun element of surprise!", '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', '

                        See all items by Multipet
']
key_benefits: ['Perfect for interactive play that strengthens the bond between you and your paw-tner.', 'Features knotted colorful rope that’s threaded through 1 colorful tennis ball.', 'Extra-durable toy is long-lasting for hours of endless fun.', 'Great for a game of tug-o-war!', 'Available in a variety of fun colors—the color ships at random for a fun surprise!']
reviews: [My 2 year old Vizsla destroyed the ball part within 20 minutes and unraveled the rope portion immediately after that. Not a good choice for a chewer!, Durable, especially for larger dogs. I have a lab mix and a pit mix, too heavy and big to really be a friendly toy. the ball is good size but the rope is too big... I was expecting higher quality., My boxer bulldog had this ball ripped open in 5 minutes and then began shredding the rope. I wouldn’t recommend for a strong chewer., My chocolate lab puppy loves tug of was and I was excited to get this ball on a rope. But after two days, the ball broke completely apart. I just cut it off and we use the rope. I hope they can redesign and make balls harder., My golden retriever puppy chewed the ball portion of this within a few weeks, however the rope is still intact., When we received this my thought was “YES!! Finally a big tough rope!” Well, my dog unraveled the rope day one and by day two this was all that was left of the entire thing!, The toy is geared towards a large dog, not a medium or small dog., My 2 golden retrievers love this toy. They could play all day just fetching this toy. It's great in the house too for a good tug of war. Great product.]

title: West Paw Skamp Fetch Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your little scamp a fun plaything with the West Paw Skamp Fetch Dog Toy. It features a unique three-lobe shape and is durable enough to stand up to moderate chewers. This toy gives your pup a satisfying sensation when chewing and has an erratic bounce for a fun game of toss and fetch. It is also easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Made in the USA, West Paw Skamp Fetch Dog Toy offers a safe alternative to sticks as an exciting toy to keep your paw-tner happy and active.', '

                        See all items by West Paw
']
key_benefits: ['Fetch toy that features a unique three-lobe shape.', 'Built for moderate chewers with a hollow, squishy feel your paw-tner will enjoy.', 'Erratic bounce makes it ideal for a game of fetch or group play with other pups.', 'Floats in water and dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.', 'Made in the USA!']
reviews: [This has been a fun toy for my puppy. He grabs it from the center a lot of times, but when he wants to play tug with it he will grab one of the round parts and shove the other two sides at me. I use this toy, along with two others from this brand, for fetching fun & also for training him to pick up his toys and put them into his toy basket. They work well, and have held up fantastically so far. I don't leave this one alone with him for a chewing session, it is hollow and I don't want him to ruin it. The solid toys from this brand are noticeably heavier, so I leave those toys for him to chew on instead. This one is definitely a top favorite for fetching though!, I was going to leave a 5 star review until I noticed just recently it had split right on the seem. Now I have to throw it away and buy another one. Greycie likes this one more than others so I felt bad taking it away hasn't had it long., This toy does require supervision because it is hollow inside, but it remarkably durable. It has been the most popular toy for dogs in our house and it's easy for dogs to share or to play tug with. This is the best Westpaw product I have found., Love this toy: not only is it durable (and my pup is a notorious toy destroyer, so that’s saying something), but it’s also versatile: great for a game of tug AND it’s easy to throw around for whenever you want to switch to fetch., Typically I love West Paw dog toys. They are durable and last for ages. Not this one. When I unpacked it I was very surprised at how lightweight and flimsy it felt. Unlike the west paw bones which are totally solid, this one is hollow. Of corse the boys (3 yr old chocolate and 4 yr old yellow labs) were out of their minds with excitement. Who wouldn’t be with a new West Paw toy? Why not I thought. Let’s give it a try. Well it took under 15 minutes for my yellow lab to chew the end clean off it at, which point I had to be the mean Mom and take it away. Very disappointed., Love west paw but this one did not survive long. The S shaped tug of war thing and some of the others are indestructible. And I have a dog that can take down a super Kong in seconds!, My high energy 2 year old pitbull has so much fun with this toy. It's the perfect shape for her to hold onto and play with herself. Entertains her for hours. She's has it for months and it doesn't have any signs of wear., I have a lab that is a power chewer and West Paw (and little else) stands up to the test! When this arrived, I was a little nervous since it was lighter weight and seemed less durable than some of the other West Paw products I had previously purchased. I have been really surprised that there is not even one tooth mark in this toy after more than a month of aggressive fetch, tug, and chewing with the toy! I actually like that it’s lighter weight when throwing it around with the dog in the house. It’s my dog’s new favorite toy! It’s also great outside and floats! With Chewy’s great customer service and West Paw guarantee, you can’t go wrong! West paw had replaced for free one toy my dog was able, My dog loves this toy. She will not play with her other rubber toys unless they are one with food in them. This one she searches for out of her toy basket and entertains herself all day long with. The hallow inner makes a squishing this toy fun. She is an avid chewer and will destroy any toy that isn't durable and this toy is holding up so far., I bought this a year or so ago for my pit bull, and he still loves it. When we added a new Rhodesian Ridgeback puppy to our family in July, this was the first toy she grabbed (though it was MUCH too big for her at the time). At 10 months she's now over 75lbs. Both dogs adore this toy. I think it's easy to carry, and it's hollow inside - so they can chew and chew and get a satisfying squish, but they can't chew off pieces of it. The pup likes to flip it up in the air and watch it bounce, then pounces on it. And, even with full-on tug-of-war games between a 70lbs pit bull and a 75lbs rigdeback pup, it still looks perfect. Definitely recommend.]

title: Jolly Pets Romp-n-Roll Dog Toy, Orange
descriptions:
["Good for tug-of-war? Check. Can be fetched? Double check. Fun to chew? Yes, yes, yes! The Jolly Pets Romp-n-Roll Purple Dog Toy fills every pup's wish list in one versatile toy. The durable, non-toxic polyethylene ball has a rope in the middle of it that makes it easy for you to get in on the game with your fun-lovin' friend. Romp-n-Roll is perfect for multi-pup homes, too!", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jolly Pets
']
key_benefits: ["This ball is made from puncture resistant material that'll withstand heavy chewers.", 'Interactive toy great for multi-pet families that like to play tug-o-war.', 'Made of non-toxic materials so you can be confident in giving this to any furry friend.', "Comforting toy to chew, tug, toss, and even for water activities at the beach, lake, or pool. If punctured it'll still float so your pet can continue to play all day long.", 'Available in multiple sizes so you can pick the perfect one for you pup.']
reviews: [I have herding breeds, so due to their active nature I look for toys like this to play catch and drop with. This one is perfect because the ball gets just the right amount of bounce when I swing it by the rope, so my dogs go nuts trying to catch it and follow it around. And also because the ball slips to the other side of the rope certain times they’ll just boop the ball and have to keep chasing it, but when they catch the rope we play tug for a bit before they’re instructed to drop it. Once they’re nice and tired, I put it away. My “four stars” is for the rope... I know if I left it out, my dogs would have that shredded after a few chews., This is one of the few toys that my 45 lbs Blue Lacy has not been able to tear up. The ball is made of a hard rubber not plastic. It is weather resistant with a hole through it in case the rope would need replacing. So funny to watch her whirl it over her head like a helicopter. She hasn't let it go while in helicopter mode so that may be a reason for outdoors. She loves it and that is all that matters. Thanks Chewy !, This is still holding up with our aggressive chewers and ball still on rope. They don’t have a lot of interest in it though. Ball may be too big., My Dane/Shepherd has the large size, and I ordered 3 of these smaller ones. She loves to run with them and toss them around., As the weather warmed up, we bought a few toys for our dog to play with outside. This is, by far, her favorite. She loves to chase the ball, and LOVES to play tug-of-war with it when she brings it back to us. The size was perfect for her (6-inch size, 60 pound Pointer), and the ball held up well against her abuse. The rope was destroyed after about an hour or two of playtime, but we expected as much, as our dog is known to destroy her toys with great relish. I can see myself buying this toy in future summers, and I would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a good backyard toy!, My dogs love this ball. The ball is durable & can kick it without breaking a toe. I rated 4 stars because the rope is not that durable. I do have 3 big dogs. The rope lasted a day but the ball is great. This is my 2nd one., I have another one of these in the same size, but different color. The blue one I have is solid, sturdy, and has lasted several months. This one had a puncture hole in it within 5 minutes - completely different than the blue one and a total waste of money. It’s actually such poor quality that I wonder if it’s not even the real jolly brand!, I bought this toy for my 9 dogs as one of their Christmas gifts. It’s survived a week of tugging and tossing between a variety of different breeds & sizes from pit bull mixes to a Jack Russel. It’s of good quality and should last a couple of months at least. Definitely will be getting more in the future. The price is nice as well. The big box pet stores sell this brand at double to triple the Chewy.com price., I am Rosie a cane Corso and I chew threw everything , this ball keeps me busy and lasts longer then any toy my family has gotten me .. Santa gave me a new ball for Christmas and I got so happy I ran right to it in the morning, Our German Shepherd shreds all of his toys but this ball has lasted! Fun to play fetch with.]

reviews: [Of course Buoy, being a lab, finished it off in about 10 minutes, but his joy was a thing of beauty to see.]

title: KONG ROGZ Flingz Buoy Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Create your own bae-watch moments with your bestie using the KONG ROGZ Flingz Buoy Dog Toy. This foam toy is designed to be durable and lightweight for long-lasting fun. The convenient shape is ideal for grab-and-go action as well as taking playtime to the beach, lake or pool in the summertime. Crafted for your canine companion’s fetching satisfaction, this buoyant toy is constructed using a unique memory foam material that’s gentle on your guy’s teeth.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ['Memory foam fetch toy for dogs.', 'Floats in water for fun at the beach, lake or pool.', 'Convenient shape is ideal for grab-and-go action.', 'Crafted for your canine companion’s fetching satisfaction.', 'Designed to be durable and lightweight for long-lasting fun.']
reviews: [This thing is great. It was a bit different than I expected. It isn’t hollow. But the pup loves to retrieve it at the beach, and chew on it at home. So far it has held up to both remarkably well. And since it isn’t hollow like a buoy, there isn’t water leaking clean up issues., Floats great and the rope in the end is a nice feature. It’s durable. We’ve played tug with it and the dogs have chew it also. It’s still in good shape and we have large breed chewers., Bought this for use in a pool for dock diving with labradors. My dog really liked chasing after it, it floats and is brightly colored. Wish it was a little larger and maybe slightly heavier but we really like it and will use it again., Very lightweight toy. My dogs will fetch it, but won't bring it back. Not the toys fault. They are just picky., We have two Newfs who love the water and the puppy is still chewing, so this was the perfect water toy for them., Goodson loves fetching his buoy from the lake. Easy to see the bright orange color, It didn't take long for my 2 year old labrador to rip this apart.]

title: Penn-Plax 3 Knot Tough Dog Rope Toy
descriptions:
['Prepare for canine playtime with the 3 Knot Dog Rope Toy from Penn-Plax! Whether your buddy likes to tug, chase or chew, this 100% cotton toy will stand up to hours of interactive play with your pup. Paw-fect for tug-of-war, this twisted cotton toy comes complete with three tough knots for easy gripping and chewing. Built to last, it’ll provide hours of fun for you and your furry friend—plus the rope fibers can help to keep teeth and gums clean. This toy is available in multiple colors and sizes to fit your pup and it’s completely machine washable for easy cleaning.', '

                        See all items by Penn-Plax
']
key_benefits: ['Encourages interactive and solo play.', 'Satisfies the natural instinct to chew.', 'Woven fibers can help to floss Fido’s teeth and keep his gums healthy.', 'Triple-knot toy—made of super-durable non-toxic cotton rope.', 'Safe to toss in the washing machine when it’s time for a cleaning.']
reviews: [I have a 12 month old black lab. He gets excited when he gets new toys so he was happy when I gave him this rope toy. Alas, it lasted a whole 10 minutes before falling apart in shreds. Little threads everywhere. Have to take it away before dog swallowed all the threads. Depending on your dog this may not be strong enough. Will probably last longer with a little dog, This has been lasting my Plott Hound a while! She enjoys playing tug a war with it and just using it to chew. I like that it has enough chomping space if she creeps up while playing., I have a 10 month old mix Jack Russel and Pug. He's more Jack than anything! He has managed to destroy toys that even my big Boxer couldn't! So far so good :) He loves this rope too!, My puppy is a chewer and this is still around. She is starting to fray the rope., This rope is made very well, tough and holds up very well, she loves it!!, This rope toy is not large, it is enormous! Way too big for my dog!]

title: ZippyPaws Fox Jigglerz Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your favorite pup will thank you for getting him the ZippyPaws Fox Jigglerz Dog Toy. It features a whole new way to squeak—the Zippy Paws exclusive noisemaker that squeaks when shaken, just the way pups love.  This cute, stuffing-free fox toy is made of tough Cordura material with reinforced stitching, for loads of shaking, chewing and carrying fun. Crinkle material in the head and tail add an extra dose of excitement. Provides hours of foxy fun for dogs of all ages and sizes!', '

', '

                        See all items by ZippyPaws
']
key_benefits: ['Jigglerz toys feature special noisemakers that squeak when shaken. Dogs love it!', 'Crinkle material in head and tail provides extra stimulation for dogs.', 'Made from tough Cordura material that’s cross-stitched for extra durability.', 'Contains no stuffing.', 'Great for dogs of all sizes.']
reviews: [I've said for several months I need to write a review about this toy because I am honestly amazed that my girl has not torn it to pieces yet. Tug ropes are her thing, but I'm tired of counting the hours and sometimes minutes until she's proved they won't last very long. She will clamp down on one ear of her fox and tug/pull you and it. The Fox Jigglerz has not ripped or frayed. I plan to purchase the others,as it has proven to be a great find!, My dog had this toy for 20 minutes. She’s already managed to rip off one of the legs and is chewing on the fur. We’ll see how long it lasts before I have to take it away from her., Most toys don't last as they are quickly destroyed, but this has passed the test. I like that there is no fluff in it either, so when it does come to an end I won't have to worry about him ingesting anything he shouldn't., I keep finding little orange fuzz everywhere from the fox but my dog likes the toy., My daughter order this for our dog but the cat wrestles with it too. As promised. Cute, noisy and, so far, durable., My Australian shepherd loves this toy and it stands up well to her rough play and chewing.]

title: Tuffy's Ultimate 3-Way Tug Squeaky Plush Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Add Tuffy's Ultimate 3-Way Tug Dog Toy to your dog’s collection of Tuffy ‘s Ultimate Soft Toys. These squeakers are great for fetching, tugging or tossing around in the backyard or park. The unique three-section design is perfect for entertaining multiple dogs.  Most Tuffy's Toys are made with up to 4 layers of material depending on shape, size and shape. The durable, water resistant toy floats in water and is machine washable.  Ultimate 3-Way Ring comes in Red Paws, Camo Blue, Pink Leopard and Yellow Bones. The fun multi-colored toy fits easily into your hand for easy throw, catch and release.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', "

                        See all items by Tuffy's
"]
key_benefits: ['Made with multiple layers of material that are bonded and sewn together to make one "Tuff" Layer. Most toys have just one seam to hold the toy together, Tuffy\'s has 7. Webbing is sewn around the edges of the toy and then the edges are sewn together to make each toy extra Tuff. Each toy has soft edges that is easy on gums.', 'Contains 6 squeakers sewn into a squeaker safety pocket inside for an added layer of security', 'Floats in water and is machine washable (air dry)', 'Tuff scale: 9 out of 10', 'Ideal for dogs over 20 lbs']
reviews: [I ordered this 3 Way Tug toy because our was rated 9 on the Tuff scale. Not even 10 minutes after opening and playing supervised tug with my dog, it had a hole in it. My dog bite into it and it ripped. Too me it’s not extremely durable or strong like advertised. I would change the rank number and not recommend for a strong jawed dog., These Tuffy toys have proven themselves to be one of my go to toys. My two boys 60 & 70 lbs enjoy a good game of tug-o-war and these can endure... just don’t let them chew on them, because “eventually”, they will chew through a seam... but even then, they linger., May be too soon to tell but this toy seems to be pretty tough. My dog loves to tug! The hand opening is larger making it hurt your hand less which is a plus!, We received this toy today. Within 10 minutes my 14 month old terrier mix had chewed strings off the edges. It's good for tug-of-war. But as far as leaving it for my dog to play with, the fabric is too easily torn up., I have two standard poodles who love to play tug of war. So far this has stood up to their rough play!, My 2 labs love this toy. I'm not sure of the longevity of this time . The edges are being frayed pretty fast ., This is the best, My dog loves, loves, this, These Tuffy dog toys are the best, very durable, & last & I have a big yellow lab., My 1 y/o GR puppy, is a toy destroyer. The Tuffy's Ultimate 3 way tug dog toy, has been the only one that has last longer. He loves it and has a lot of fun with it., I have 2 dogs. The 3 holes are perfect to play tug o war. After they pulling out the stuffing and chewing through the connections I still have 3 “toys” for them to play with., We have two young male Airedales....they love to both take the same toy and run around with it in tandem. This works very well! And, it's durable.]

title: Booda Bone 2-Knot Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Entertain your pup for hours with Booda’s Bone 2-Knot Rope Toy! Paw-fect for interactive play like games of tug-o-war or supervised solo play, this fun rope toy is made of tightly twisted cotton for durability. It also doubles as floss as your canine chews, helping to so support his dental health by removing plaque and tartar. And since the rope is completely machine-washable, cleaning the toy after a day of play is a hassle-free experience for you!', '

                        See all items by Booda
']
key_benefits: ['Encourages interactive play and supervised solo play.', 'As your pup chews, the cotton rope acts like dental floss, helping to remove plaque and tartar.', 'The cotton rope is twisted for added durability.', 'Machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Available in multiple sizes, so you can find the right fit for your furry friend.']
reviews: [Yes, it is tiny, so while I can't use it to wrestle with my dog (Shih Poo), he has a lot of fun slinging it around and chewing on it., My 16 week old Labrador female pup totally destroyed one of the large size. She fortunately vomited a wad of the strings before they could form a blockage in her intestines. I have had several of these in the past that held up much better. Apparently they have found a cheaper way to make these, probably in China., My dog is a destroyer when it comes to toys. I honestly only bought this rope because I needed to add like $0.50 to an order to get free shipping; so, for the cheap price, I figured it would be shredded in just a couple days. On a happy note, it's still holding up and my pup loves playing with it, she's practically ignoring all the other (more expensive) toys now., I would not recommend this dog toy as large strings came off rather easy and my dog got sick and could not go to the bathroom. We watched her with the toy and removed it when that happened. I would not recommend this for aggressive chewers. She is a 25 pound sheltie., Ohhhhhh, these are GREAT for furry thieves. My one dog (I have 5) is such a thief who LOVES to take items ie: one (just one) of MY slippers or a sock & if I see him we will have a tug of war which he usually wins, how I don't know, then when I don't notice, he will take MY slipper or sock outside & bury it. Last yr I had 3 slippers, ALLLLL without a partner. BUT...now with these knotted ropes we can play tug of war & so far he hasn't buried any of them AND he leaves my slippers alone. What a GREAT & simple idea someone had. We both love these. Thank You!!!, I bought the x-small on accident for my Kammi bear. She is a 24 pound baby who loves to bite rope. The rope started to curl when it was wet and stayed curled. This may be due to the size of the x-small rope. Overall, it was okay for the price but it did not hold up well., Thought it might be too small....but our dog loves to carry it around. It just fits in her mouth like a horse bit. Plus she likes the fringes!, Puppies love this, and spend hours chewing each time they get one., Great toy for my energetic Bischon and she loves playing pulling, Chloe loves playing tug a war with this rope. Since she is a little dog it is great to build up her teeth and gums. We play for hours]

title: KONG Dental with Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['The KONG Dental has special grooves that clean teeth and gums as dogs chew. KONG Easy Treat can be used inside the grooves to get your dog chewing. Fill the inside of the Dental with KONG Snacks or Ziggies to satisfy your dog’s curiosity.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', 'For Stuffing Paste: Click here', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ['Made of durable KONG natural rubber for a long-lasting toy.', 'Fun to chase and fetch with a replaceable rope, and is designed for the average chewer.', "Great for use with Stuff'N Easy Treat paste to make this toy even more exciting.", 'Patented Denta-Ridges reduce plaque while providing a gentle abrasive cleaning and conditioning of teeth and gums.', 'Available in two sizes: Small and Medium, so you can pick the perfect fit for your pup.']
reviews: [I have come to expect a high level of quality and durability from Kong products. This toy did not meet that expectation. Our dogs (40 lb pit mix and 85 lb Great Pyrenees/Dalmatian mix) untied the knots and removed the kong in less than 5 minutes of playing. They severed the rope in less than an hour. So, rather than having a toy they can play with together, they have two short ropes and one kong., My puppy was very excited to get this toy. Kong products have been a big hit with her. They are usually durable, at least the rubber parts are. The rope on this toy didn’t even last 3 hours., My young pooch is just learning how to play tug games..... thought this would be a good option as she likes her other red KONG toys. Very disappointed that after two "tugs" the knots came undone and rope came out of the holes... and is nearly impossible to thread back through...thought I could re string and tie it in a circle; no so much. Now its just another roll- around toy., Got this for my teething 2lb chiweenie puppy and he’s not the only one who loves it! It’s our 15lb ginger cat Tiggy’s favorite toy as well. The toy is very durable and they both love the tassels on the ends., Lasted all of one day. Two 15 pound Dogs chewed through the rope right away. Waste of money., Toy lasted 5 minutes. Dog tore it in half. Worst Kong toy ever bought. Waste of money!, Etta is a 10-month-old, 40-lb. mutt. In 90 minutes or so she had bitten the rope in four pieces and had untied the knots. She’s not an aggressive chewer. I threw the rope away but kept the red rubber part. This is the first time Kong has disappointed us. I just replaced one Kong toy that we’ve used for decades (through southern summers in the yard and run through the dishwasher countless times) because it finally began to flake. Save your money. Kong makes much sturdier toys. Keep shopping., Favorite toy! This was my first dogs number one toy and 16 years later it had seen better days. The new one was a welcomed sight., Our 40 lb dog loves this toy and hasn’t torn it up yet!, Precious was so happy to get her new toy. She is a miniature poodle around 12 pounds. I ordered the medium for her which is alittle big. However, she doesn’t mind and chews on the rope each day. She is able to put the rubber KONG in her mouth, but because is too big she prefers the rope.]

title: KONG Wrapz Bone Dog Toy
descriptions:

title: USA-K9 Cherry Bomb Treat Dispensing Tough Dog Chew Toy
descriptions:

With its convenient opening on the rubber ball, you can easily keep it full of treats for your impatient canine companion. Made with a natural rubber compound that is non-toxic and biodegradable, the only thing you'll have to worry about is keeping it stocked with your sidekick's favorite goodies. It's also dishwasher safe, so you can easily defuse any nasty situation.", '

key_benefits: ['The attached rope gives this fun toy additional control during training and playtime.', 'With a convenient hole on the rubber ball, you can customize a delicious payload for your pooch.', 'Made from Puppyprene, a proprietary power-chewer rubber compound that’s durable enough to withstand the most explosive of chewing sessions.', "It's dishwasher safe so you won't blow a fuse when it's time to clean your BFF's new favorite toy.", 'Proudly made in the USA.']
reviews: [Durable toy for pitbull puppies or tough breeds. My pitbull is one years old and has had this toy for almost a month now, which is good for someone who has tough dogs that like to tear up everything. I personally, like to stick treats in the center well i’m working to keep my pup occupied for awhile., This is great. It has a rope that they love to chew on and also makes it fun to throw. It’s a ball, what dog could resist and a treat dispenser. My puppy loves to destroy things but not this thing yet. Both dogs love to play tug-of-war with it.. just a great item., I was really surprised that the rope was made of such flimsy material. My little 6 lb puppy was able to chew through that in a very short time. The sturdiness of the rope should've matched the sturdiness of the ball. I would not have bought this item if I knew the rope was not durable., My dog chewed through the rope in minutes. So now I guess we just have a strange heavy ball she doesn't seem to be excited about. Wouldn't recommend., We read the reviews and our dog LITERALLY WITHIN SECONDS chewed up the rope part!!!! Did not withstand chew test after 1 minute., The minute he saw this he got very wild. We swing it around in the air like a lasso to get his attention and he is hypnotized. He loves to carry this toy around by the rope and fling it about his head, it’s hysterical to watch, and he seems obsessed with it. It is kind of a German Shepherd sized toy, and he’s only 30 pounds but he’s very athletic, crazy and likes big toys., I bought these as take-home gifts for a litter of mouthy Portuguese Water Dog puppies, thinking the owners could use them later on for fetch training, or for crate play. I was surprised that the puppies (6-8 weeks old) LOVED them! Used them as tug toys, chewed on the rope, rolled the ball around. Very pleased to have such a good sturdy useful toy to send home with my new families., My dog is very destructive with toys, but this one she loves to toss around, it’s very comical. She has not chewed it up! Also little treats can be put inside., Our 6 month old rescue puppy loves this toy! She loves playing fetch with it and bringing it back for more playtime. Love that we can put a treat inside and keep her busy trying to get it out. Had my doubts when I ordered it but so glad I did as it is now a favorite go to toy!, We have three girls with the husky being dominant. She never lets this toy get out of her site. I haven't even put a treat in it and she chews it vigorously, tosses it (it bounces!) and rolls on it!. She hasn't been able to put a scratch on it either and a lot of those wimpy plastic toys end up breaking. Very happy with this and highly recommend it.]

reviews: [Smaller than the sizing listed, closer to 6 inches than the listed 10. Definitely not for aggressive chewers. After about 5 minutes of tug this was already starting to unravel and within 20 minutes it was an unidentifiable pile of rope., I have this for an Australian Shepard puppy. We got the toy when she was 12weeks and she now 18weeks. She’s a chewer for a puppy and this is one of her favorite toys. We have not had any issue with it coming undone or anything. Will buy this again if needed., I'm not exactly sure what animal the toy my dogs received is.... But it looks like he's been used as a crash test dummy before coming to me. My dogs are happy with it, despite it's appearance and distended knees and weird legs coming out from the bottom and the top... Just not as cute as in the picture is my biggest disappointment. It just looks like random knotted rope., I have an aggressive chewer dog and he was able to get this toy apart in minutes and start eating the rope., This toy is great. I didn't think Chewy (10 pound Morkie) would play with it at first, but he loves it. He growls when he plays with it and tries to rip it apart. It is great that it is made so well that he can't damage it!!!, After a few days, my pittie pup had this iguana unrecognizable and half-unraveled. I would buy from Mammoth again, but my money's going toward the 3 - 5 knot ropes which last FOREVER. Would not buy this again. Maybe it would be good for a more mild chewer., This toy lasted about a week. My pup was in bliss untying this toy before I tired of picking up strings and threw it away., I have a pretty easy going doodle mix and she shredded it within a day, It didn’t last long with my huskies they had ii chewed all apart with in a day. But they are very rough on toys. Been trying to find something durable for them and unfortunately this was not it., It will be in her xmas socking to be opened xmas morn . This will be her first xmas. Expect to see a lot more toys from chewy.]

reviews: [I bought 2 of these, one for my 70lb german shepard/doberman and one for my 80lb pit mix. Both dogs love playing with them. My shepard had it ripped in half within 5 minutes, but still loves playing tug with the pieces. The other one is still intact, guess the other guy is a little gentler. Great toy, but if you've got a chewer, it's pretty easy to chew through., The pups love them whether playing alone or playing tug of war together, This is a great durable tour but the name chain implies more than one ring linked together which is exactly why I bought it. Was disappointed it was one plain old ring., However my 9 month old puppy chewed through both rings in less than a week. If your dog is not a chewer it's a great toy, My 50lb goldendoodle LOVED this and it is great to play tug with. Unfortunately, he sat down for an extended chew and bit a chunk out., My dog had chunks out ofnit withing the first day. Good tug a war tog though., It was my understanding that this toy was designed with strong chewers in mind. That is why I chose it as one of my Labrador Pup's Christmas items. Unfortunately it did not live up to its name or description. Within LESS than 24 hours of play, my pup was pulling chunks of rubber off the rings, thus it was necessary for meto take the toy away from him. I would not recommend this toy for strong or power chewers according to the experience I have had with it., We have a Lab that needs tough toys and like many of the other JW PET rubber toys this one holds up well. He chews and plays tug of war and this toy as well as the footballs, Hol-ee Roller and Action Dog Toy show no signs of wear after constant heavy use! These toys are a great addition to any dog's playthings!, Unfortunately after about 45 minutes of chewing and playing with this I noticed little chunks of the toy coming off the surface. Not the best., Love this product. Our previous dog rejected all toys but theses. They last for years and provide hours of chasing,retrieving and chewing. Our current Australian Kelpie cannot get through a day without a lot of ring play. I felt so fortunate that you had them for sale. I couldn't find them in any of the four per stores that I visited and the old ones are getting a bit worn out. I bought 3 and put two away for the future.]

reviews: [Really like it, didn't realize how loud the bell would be, it actually scared the pups at first but once they got used to it they like to play with it! Only lasted a couple days, Within 10 minutes, my puppy chewed through one half of the rope. Then she chewed through some parts of the tire, and this morning she ripped the other half of the rope off. She likes chasing it but it’s really not durable., Not good for a dog that likes to chew on his toys. The only thing left after a few days was just the rope. I thought it was a harder rubber that he couldn’t chew. But he still likes it., First off, I didn't know this toy jingled and it's by far the most annoying toy ever. Within minutes my 6 mo golden had chewed the nibbs off the tires. The tires were too big for such a small rope. Really a waste of your money., This toy is supposed to withhold the “strong” chewers and it simply does not. Don’t waste your money. My dog has pieces of rubber off within seconds and luckily I stopped her from eating the pieces. If you love your doggo I strongly recommend not buying this toy. Thankfully Chewy is very understanding and refunded me my money., It was torn apart within a hour of opening the box, Our two year old lab mix destroyed this toy in 2.5 hours. Not a good investment., Our 2 yr old 85lb Lab loves rope toys. I thought she would like this one, but the ball is a bit too big for the short lengths of rope. If ropes were longer she could get a better hold on the toy and then be able to swing it around creating havoc in the house, my dog chewed this toy through the tire pare in 15 minutes not very sturdy but a cute toy. I love Chewy and will still order from them just have to make sure toys are stonger.]

reviews: [I bought this toy (named Snake) for my 17lb Boston Terrier. It was a sometimes toy. Mostly LilyButt forgot about it, but when she remembered, TUG-TUG-KILL SNAKE was great fun! For months! Then a beautiful, sweet pitbull moved in with us. She found Snake and within a day, all Snake was good for was confetti. It was a tragic demise to a beloved toy, but we've learned an important lesson. Size does, sometimes, matter., My chessie loves shaking this toy violently and playing tug o war or fetch with it. It stretches quite long. He de-fluffed the football end instantly but the braid is still good several weeks later, We have a heavy chewer who is determined to fully shred any toy. He took out the ball in 20 mins, but the rope has held up for weeks! It expands when tugged on, and only kind of retracts afterwards. It'll never retract the way it came in the mail, but it'll a great tug o war rope!, My golden retriever is 75lbs, she’s a shredder. She had the nerd ball tore off in 15 minutes. The rope however is sturdy., This toy can really be pulled and stretched without ripping or breaking! Stuffed ball on the end is easily ripped open like any stuffed toy. It probably work better with tennis balls on each end. But even without the stuffed ball, The empty bottle can still be cold in that other material and stretch and stretch and stretch. I think they should have something on both ends for the dogs to grab., My dog loved it, but destroyed it in about an hour.]

reviews: [Our 10 month old labradoodle loves this toy but it just isn’t durable and we had to take it away after only one week. The inner ring is holding up but he was able to chew off the outside gripper material and we were worried that he would swallow big chunks of it. I was bummed because he loves it and it was not a cheap toy, but it is not worth the risk to allow him to continue playing with it.]

descriptions:

The Dogzilla Wing-a-Ball Dog Toy, made from durable high-quality braided polypropylene rope, features a handy grip on one end and a monkey fist knot on the other, making this the paw-fect toy for a game of fetch as well as tug-of-war. It also floats in water, making day at the lake or beach even more fun.', '

                        See all items by Dogzilla

reviews: [It broke right away. Don’t waist your hard earned money.]

title: Booda Bone & Tug 3-Knot Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Entertain your pup for hours with the Booda Bone 3-Knot Rope Toy! Paw-fect for interactive play like games of tug-o-war or supervised solo play, this fun rope toy is made of tightly twisted cotton for durability. It also doubles as floss as your canine chews, helping to so support his dental health by removing plaque and tartar. And since the rope is completely machine-washable, cleaning the toy after a day of play is a hassle-free experience for you!', '

                        See all items by Booda
']
key_benefits: ['Encourages interactive play and supervised solo play.', 'As your pup chews, the cotton rope acts like dental floss, helping to remove plaque and tartar.', 'The cotton rope is twisted for added durability.', 'Machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Available in multiple sizes, so you can find the right fit for your furry friend.']
reviews: [If you have a "chewer" this is not the toy for your fur baby. For a dog that likes to occasionally play tug, this would be great. This was not the best for our pitbull but for other breeds it would be great!, My two dogs Mastiff mix and Dalmatian/Husky mix play pretty rough and this tug rope keeps them going and has held up to the constant tugging and perfect for two dogs to play and chase each other. What first caught my attention was how inexpensive it was. That was my reason to first purchase but now I've seen it I would definitely buy another when the time comes., This toy lasted 20 minutes with our dog. It worked well as a tug of war toy but it does not hold up to any chewing or dogs that like to pull pieces apart. Very disappointed in the durability., My GSD mix dog loves tug of war games. This rope lasted a very long time for her. It was her first toy with us and it lasted about 2 months. I tried generic brand rope toys from our local pet stores and they rip immediately. I think you would like this toy. One negative: this toy could be longer. Next time I will buy 5 knots., My puppy loves it, but not sure how long it will last., This is a high quality basic tug toy at a great price.]

title: Planet Dog Orbee-Tuff Fetch Ball with Rope Tough Dog Chew Toy, Pink
descriptions:
['These Orbee-Tuff Woof. Fetch balls are durable, bouncy, buoyant and mint-scented!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Planet Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Doggie durable and buoyant', 'Bouncy, minty, recyclable and non-toxic material', 'For the tough chewers', 'Perfect for tossing, tugging, floating, and fetching', 'Made in the U.S.A.']
reviews: [We got this because she likes to try to get us to tug at a ball in her mouth, but we don't want to put our fingers too near her teeth. Within the first few minutes, I noticed she was pulling off the blue letters, so I pulled the rest off myself and gave it back. Then she began chewing up the rope. It didn't take long to chew right through. There are some pieces of rope left, so tugging with her is still possible, but she usually brings us her orbee-tuff squeak ball for that. I would replace a stronger rope, but this one has a big knot inside the ball, and can't be pulled out through the small holes. I'm sure this ball would be great for a dog that doesn't prefer to chew up the rope. [But definitely, I ordered this for my adult mini schnoodle since she loves to play tug, but this ball was way too big, hard, and heavy. She instead enjoys the rope which she tries to use to drag the ball around. I wouldn’t suggest for smaller breeds., This is by far my puppy's favorite toy. She loves to play tug of war with the rope, and she loves to chase the ball when I throw it - it's very bouncey. She also loves to just hold the rope and swing the ball around by herself, which keeps her occupied for quite awhile! If you have a high energy puppy who needs something to help them blow off steam, get this toy! It's also extremely durable!, A few tosses, a couple tugs and we ended up with just a ball. Definitely not worth the money. You're just paying for the name Planet Blue Dog., The Orbie-Tuff Fetch Ball with Rope is great fun! The ball is a little larger than I expected, but my small Golden Retriever has adjusted to it and loves it! For training, I can stick it in a pocket while we are working, and then pull it out for a joyful reward. I can throw it, and tug with it, and it even floats in the pool!, I really wanted to like this toy as my pup loves rope toys, unfortunately this one lasted less than 30 min before it began to tear. Definitely not worth it if you have a tough chewer ):, Ball lasted one night ! Not good if your dogs a chewer . I took a gamble on this I usually get West Paw balls but there sold out, One bite & dog bit thru rope like a scissors. Ball survived, I have bought several of these Fetch balls - dogs love them and I don’t have to touch the slime., My German Shepherd loved this when we got it. Within less than a week, however, the ball broke clean through the rope. It broke in half. Usually planet dog products are sturdier.]

reviews: [Just received this and also found the rope fills the hole, leaving no room for treats. Will be returning., The rope knot inside the rubber "Mouse" is so huge that there is no room for treats. The mouse is also very heavy]

title: Tuffy's Jr 3WayTug Squeaky Plush Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Tuffy’s Jr 3WayTug Dog Toy is designed for small- and medium-sized pups who like to play a little “ruff”. This toy is reinforced with multiple layers of material, extra rows of stitching and has webbing on the outside edge to protect the seams during those exciting games of toss and fetch. Not only is this plush paw-fect for indoor fun, but since it floats, it's also a great for the pool, lake or beach! And to really get him excited, it has a squeaker that’s sewn inside a protective pouch to help keep him safe.  While he enjoys playing with his new toy, you’ll love the fact that it’s machine washable, making cleaning easier, especially after a few days of outdoor play!", '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', "

"]
key_benefits: ['Durable and paw-fect for interactive play like a game of tug-o-war or fetch—this toy is not intended for chewing.', 'Multiple layers of durable materials and stitching are used to help extend the life of the toy.', 'Machine washable and floats in water, making it great for the pool or beach.', 'Features a squeaker inside that’s sewn inside a protective pouch to help keep your dog safe while he plays.', 'The smaller version of Tuffy’s 3WayTug Dog Toy, making it great for small and medium paw-tners.']
reviews: [My 40 pound pittie mix LOVES this toy. She's a big fan of squeakers and playing tug of war with us, so this is perfect. We play pretty rough with her and it's shown no signs of ripping. It's the perfect size for her too., The toy itself appears well made and fairly durable. However, this toy is very small. My 75 lb dog and 45 lb dog will not be able to play with this because there’s only room for one snout. I’m so disappointed that it isn’t large enough for them., I have 2 boxers that like to chew everything. They love this toy, and it's really durable!!! By far, it's their favorite toy!!!!!, We have an English bull dog this toy lasts her the longest. She tears most toys up in 2 hours. This toy lasts for several months., This is my golden's favorite toy to play fetch with!, The girls tear at this thing but it lasts and lasts. I tie a rope to it so we can circle it over head and the border collie leaps to catch., It took my french bulldog about 20 minutes to start tearing out the stuffing. Not very tough., Our Lab, Tasha, loves playing with this toy. My kids play fetch and tug with her for quite a while. It's great taking to the park. We've washed it a couple times and it holds up really well., This toy lasted about 3 days with my bulldog who is a moderate chewer., can tug, or throw. nice quality and fun for our dog.]

title: Multipet Cross-Ropes Squeaky Plush Dog Toy, Duck
descriptions:
['Dogs love to tug but not all toys are built for it; luckily Multipet’s Cross-Ropes Dog Toy is! This durable, ballistic-style nylon toy is designed with a cotton rope for pulling and tugging and a squeaker that’s sure to keep your paw-tner on his toes. Not only is this rope dog toy fun to play with on land, but it’s just as much fun to play with in the water—that’s right, it floats, too! Your pup will love playing a game of fetch in the pool, lake or the ocean. This toy comes in a variety of colors that ship at random for a fun element of surprise!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Multipet
']
key_benefits: ['Reinforced with double stitching for added durability.', 'Crafted from ballistic-style nylon.', 'Floats in water, making it paw-fect for the pool, lake, pond or beach.', 'Designed with a cotton rope for plenty of tugging fun.', 'Comes with a squeaker inside to excite your dog.']
reviews: [I love this toy and came back to purchase a second! It is great for playing fetch, especially in the winter. This duck "floats" on soft snow better than any other toy I've found. The rope is great for a game of tug-of-war, too! I've found that the heavy canvas fabric lasts much longer than a typical stuffed toy and is easier to clean., These were fun. For as long as they lasted. My medium size doodle chew through these in no time!!, My GR LOVES these ducks. We have two dogs a GSD and a GR and the golden knows when we get these ducks they're HIS new toy. He has had one for almost a year and he has torn off the tail end but nothing else. They're very sturdy toys not easy for them to tare up., My pup absolutely ADORES this toy. It was the first toy she started to play with after I rescued her and one of the few she chooses to play with while alone. I highly recommend this toy if your pup likes rope toys, but wants a little more to chew on. The weakest parts are the ties where the rope is connected to the bird, but I tied the rope back onto the surviving loops to prolong my need to buy her another one., My Golden destroys toys. And yes the rope is frayed, I knot it up. But the nylon body is holding up! We joked about it making an hour, 2, then 3, into the evening, a whole day, another whole day, then why it's been a week, 2, 3......not so pretty any more but her go to toy and the body still whole., Our 5 year old loves her toys & this one in particular! (If your dog is a “chewer & a ripper”, keep an eye on them with this toy), Sadly my babies loved this so much it didn't last 5 mins :(, The toy is great but the select color link led to other toy choices not color choice, My dog loves this and keeps it next to her when she naps!, love these colors!Dogs see some color, like a yellow,blue and grey washout.The birds are heavy shoelace roped;pull by the tail to tighten.I put bird training wing feathers under the laces.My 5mo old GSP will retrieve up to 3 birds at once, each month add a bird until he gets confused.]

reviews: [I am forever on the search for a toy our miniature Bernedoodle will not chew through. I was hopeful this toy would last a while. Within 10 minutes of giving her the chew, the black ring in the middle was chewed through, there were bits of black on the floor and we found several bits later (TMI!!), Our 70# shepherd mix usually chews through most ring style toys in a matter of hours. It’s been over a week and still looks like new, Within an hour, my lab chewed it up. May be better for smaller dogs. It’s heavy and solid. But it did t stand up to a heavy chewer., I bought this as a tug toy for my 62 pound pittie and his 70 pound boxer BFF to play when we meet at the dog park. Well the 1st and 2nd tug session went great. They tugged for maybe 20 min on and off both times so not too much use. On the third time they started to play a it broke within a couple of minutes. When the dogs aren't playing with the toy it was kept in my pitties dog park toy bag so it wasn't rotting in the sun or being chewed on to break it down. So it wasn't worth it the money in my opinion., I was very disappointed that my dog was about to destroy it within 2 hours of receiving it., I purchased one of these last week from chewy. The little nubs seem hard to resist and the rubber is fairly soft., Great for tug O' war with my Big BEAR!!! Oh I mean 80 lbs. Golden!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!, I have 2 puppies and they love it. Also it doesn't fall apart, Both our pups absolutely loved this toy! Large pitbil and Australian Shepard each grabbed and end and played for hours! Must love the flavor too as they both carry this thing around like it's their baby]

title: Nerf Dog Mega Tuff TPR Foam Competition Stick Dog Toy, 12-in
descriptions:
['Get ready for a paw-some time with your best buddy with you play fetch with the Nerf Dog TPR Foam Megaton Competition Stick Dog Toy. This thermoplastic rubber (TPR) and foam toy is designed to withstand hours of ruff-housing and chewing. The bright colors help you and your furry friend keep track of your throws, whether you’re playing in the yard or at the park. The dual-sided body lets you run together for even more pet-and-parent bonding time.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Nerf Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Foam fetchable toy for dogs.', 'Encourages human-to-pooch interaction.', 'Designed to withstand hours of rough play.', 'Lightweight and portable.', 'Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.']
reviews: [Just ordered our 2nd of these, as 1st one purchased for our Golden Retriever (soon to be 3) simply wore out. He LOVES this toy; it's remained his favorite for outdoors! Chose the longer, 12" one this time, as when we play tug, when he "adjusts" his hold, we "adjust" our fingers!! Stick length ordered may be influenced by your dog's level of agressiveness in play. Our 80-pounder still has his original stuffed animals, so he's not a destructive chewer. The Nerf stick core did dry out over time (one end became brittle after 2 years); one end loop frayed. Overall, it held up well, spending much time in the FL rain/sun. These 2 characteristics, aggressive play and chewing, may play into your decision, We got this toy delivered today- I chose it because it said it was designed to withstand hours of tough play and chewing. Unfortunately our tough chewer ripped the thing apart in about 10 minutes, leaving little neon green fragments all over my couch. I’m just glad I was nearby to make sure he didn’t swallow any pieces! Really disappointing considering this wasn’t cheap. If you’re just looking for a toy to play fetch with then it’s probably fine, but definitely not for rough players or chewers, Floats and is holding up nicely for my chewer. I bought 4 of them and would buy them again.]

title: Nerf Dog Squeaker Vortex Chain Tug Dog Toy, Medium
descriptions:

Your pal will love the football shape that makes it easy to grab and fetch, and has a squeaker inside to make playtime louder and more exciting. Plus, the ultra-long tail is perfectly tug-tastic! When you want to add much-needed exercise to your dog’s activity, toss this toy at home or at the park. Since it’s also waterproof, your water-loving pup will jump for joy over it at the beach, pool, or lake.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. key_benefits: ['Playtime-ready football shape with squeaker makes it irresistible to chase and fetch.', 'Ultra-long tail is perfect for your pal to play tug of war, with you or other friendly pups.', 'Built to stand up to extra tough play with durable, tear-resistant nylon.', 'Provides plenty of enriching entertainment and hours of much-needed exercise.', 'Perfect for playing at home, in the backyard, beach, park, or pool.']
reviews: [My dog absolutely loved her friends Nerf Dog toy and I knew I had to buy it for her. She loves to play tug especially and it’s long enough you don’t have to worry about your hand getting to close when your dog is in the tug zone, I purchased two of these Vortex toys and neither one was sewn well at the seams. I'm bummed out. I hoped that my dog would have lots of playtime with it. It tore apart in under a week., It might be labeled (printed) NERF...but it is not even close to the nerf composition. It a polyester stuffed fabric football (that is not very well sewn together) with a couple of strings holding it to the handle. My dog ripped up that football in under 2 minutes, so I cut it off the handle and threw it away. I am using the handle as a tug toy,,,for that it works great, First, she bit of the stitching on the ball and all the fluff came out. And then she bit off the end of the rope. The rope might be strong but the stitching is soo weak., I was a little hesitant to order this toy because toys don't last long in this house. My girl is very strong and a very strong chewer. However, because we are all in this "stay at home" order I needed another way (I have several) to keep her exercised and happy. This really fills the need. She loves to play tug and has yet to punch a whole in the football. I highly recommend this toy., First my dog chewed the end of the football and removed all the stuffing and it was shortly after that she started to chew the end apart and it unraveled. Not as strong as it looked., My English bulldogs love this toy. It's fun and sturdy. Great for tug of war., Wish I read reviews before buying this for our Golden Retriever. It lasted a day. It was only used as intended - as a tug toy - but she ripped the football off in no time at all., Bought this for my Rottweiler mix, he tore the ball off after 2 days. Not surprised since he is 2 years old and very strong n determined. Even though he tore it as I had expected, I still give this 4 stars. The rope is strong n we have played tug of war n fetch for hours. He still plays w the football, but the rope is definitely his favorite., We bought the Nerf Dog Squeaker Vortex Chain Tug Dog Toy and gave it to our 8 month old Boston Terrier. He promptly went to remove the tag on the ball and eat right threw to the ball in a matter of minutes, major downer.]

title: Jax and Bones Anchor Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Anchor Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [This is our second Jax and Bones toy. I was worried the dark colors would stain but nope! Our 4-month-old loves to chew, of course, and these do the trick! Such fun shapes, too. I'll be buying more in the future., If you want a toy that lasts more than 5 minutes then don't buy this toy. My dog shredded this toy immediately. Also I thought this toy would be bigger than it was. I don't recommend this toy, I will stick with Kong products., I've been looking for something that my dog can't destroy, and this might have a chance. We've been playing and chewing on this for over two weeks and it hasn't frayed, untied or ripped yet. Other "tuff" toys have been destroyed in mere seconds., I was hoping this would last more than a day. It did not. There is still about a 4 inch section that is intact but it will probably be gone in a few more days., she did start ripping it apart, but she does that with most toys., This rope toy began unraveling within the first 5 minutes of play., Our lab puppy is chewing through most toys but this anchor still looks new and he loves tug time with it., Nowhere close to big enough for two 70 lb dogs to play tug of war with which is what I asked for. Maybe 10" long and 8" wide across the bottom. Was amazed at size for $15.00. Better last a long time. Would return but husband already gave it to the dogs., This last a long time. She chases it and roughs it up., She loves it, plays with it all the time by herself or with someone throwing it for her.]

title: Chuckit! Hydrosqueeze Duo Tug Dog Toy, Medium
descriptions:
['Cool your paw-tner off while still showing him a good time with the Chuckit! Hydrosqueeze Duo Tug Dog Toy. It is designed to hold and release water during play and when thrown to help your furry friend beat the heat. Ideal for a game of tug-o-war, a durable nylon cord connects the two balls together with soft inside cores that absorb water. It also floats so feel free to take it to the pool, beach or lake. With bright colors for increased visibility, you and your sidekick will be sure to find the Chuckit! Hydrosqueeze Duo Tug Dog Toy wherever you throw it.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Chuckit!
']
key_benefits: ['Interactive tug toy designed to hold and release water during play.', 'Cools your pup off during the warmer months to beat the heat.', 'Durable nylon cord connects the two balls together with soft inside cores that absorb water.', 'Ideal for a trip to the pool, beach or lake as this toy floats.', 'Features a bright orange color for increased visibility.']
reviews: [My toy poodle is able to chew the middle piece easily. Not very durable for the price., Our little dogs love to swim out for this as they can use the webbing to bring it in., This was destroyed in 20 minutes. This might work for small dogs 40lbs or less but not for a dog 50lbs or over. I was disappointed being a Chuckit! product, I expected better., I bought this hoping it would be the same as the non-hydro squeeze tug o war toy. It lasted less than a month using the toy as it was described. The other one lasted over a year even though it was left outside. Thankfully the larger version of the other one came back in stock. It's his favorite and totally worth the money lasting as long as it did., Our husky puppy shreds everything and love to chew on the strap and the ends. However, the 2 blue fabric balls had to be removed. He caught one with his tooth and yanked it out. Other than those fabric balls being removed it is an awesome toy!, My two Aussies love this toy. Keeps them busy. They play tug of war and are so entertaining., This toy does not float! My GSD was so excited for this new toy! She went running into the pool to find that her new toy was gone. She was so confused when it sunk to the bottom of the pool. After three days of sitting in the bottom of the pool, the balls no longer have any color in them either., Bought this thinking it wound stand up to a mastiff puppy but even at first glance could tell it wasn't up to the job. Maybe beagle but not a mastiff, Two dogs will destroy this toy with in mins. I had my dog and another dog play tug a war and with in 5 mins. It didn’t last. I sent it back to Chewy and I get no refund or any response. Not happy, My 4 month old puppy has been playing tug with this everywhere from the beach to the vet's office for two months now, and it's still holding up! She's not exactly gentle, either.]

title: Nerf Dog Light Up LED Barbell Dog Toy, Medium
descriptions:
['The Nerf Dog Light Up LED Barbell Dog Toy combines all the fun of playing fetch with a uniquely designed toy that you can keep using after the sun goes down. This barbell-shaped toy has an LED light in each end that flashes bright colors as it flies through the air. It’s visible up to 300 feet away so you and your pup can have a nighttime play session without losing sight of his favorite toy. The rubber exterior gives you a good grip for throwing. And when it lands, the fun continues as it bounces back and forth with your pooch eagerly chasing behind. The cutouts help keep it above water and make it easier for your dog to pick up in his mouth so the game can start all over again.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Nerf Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Combines all the fun of playing fetch with a uniquely designed toy that you can keep using after the sun goes down.', 'This barbell-shaped toy has an LED light in each end that flashes bright colors as it flies through the air.', 'The rubber exterior gives you a good grip for throwing.', 'When it lands, the fun continues as it bounces back and forth with your pooch eagerly chasing behind.', 'The cutouts help keep it above water and make it easier for your dog to pick up in his mouth so the game can start all over again.']
reviews: [We called it a “Leave It” toy since it is not durable for chewing. Perfect for late night fetching but one side no longer works and after bouncing the other light turns off. ): It worked perfectly for the first 2 weeks and was well taken care of. Just not worth the high price for the quality received., Although my dogs were super excited about this toy, it didn’t make it 5 minutes. Good concept but not durable at all., Our dog absolutely LOVES these well made and durable rubber bones. She loves to fetch at night. They are so incredibly durable. Our dog threw one in our pool , where it stayed at the bottom for 48 hours- it still lights up and works great!! Can’t recommend highly enough!, My Bernese Mt Dog loves this toy! He had a light up toy that was great for finding in the snow, but it was destroyed. This one will last. We started with the Nerf light up ball, but my cattle dog chewed the outer shell off, so he’s not allowed to use this., Great toy but not too good for chewers. He had this thing chewed up in 1 minutes!, My two Boston Terriers loved playing and tugging on this toy., My first impression was that this was the coolest toy ever. My dog loved it! HOWEVER, after less than 10 minutes of play (not tug of war or real rough chewing -- just regular throw and retrieve) the plastic around the balls tore. It is way too fragile for any dog toy. It has a lot of potential and hopefully Nerf will remake it with better materials. As it is now, though, don't waste your money., I would like it to light up when the dog plays with the toy, My 11 month old pup destroyed this within 5 minutes. He pulled a piece off the end and the ball came out., This was one of the 3 new toys I bought for my dog and it was instantly his favorite toy out of the bunch. He is pretty rough with his toys and Nerf toys always hold up well to his chewing. The lights are bright too! Perfect for night time fetch.]

She loves this toy & playing fetch with it!]

title: Pet Champion Strategy Camo Retreiver Dog Toy

Hold the toy from either end, give it a good swing, and fling it across the lawn. Your little athlete will love running to catch this dynamic toy. It's built with rugged oxford material—so it's designed for ruff play—while the hidden squeaker helps to hold your pup's attention. Perfect for games in the backyard, at the dog park or anywhere else you exercise with your dog, this retriever toy will show him how to go for the gold.", '

']
key_benefits: ['Features a sturdy oxford material, so it can stand up to your throws.', 'Built with a squeaker inside the tubular end.', 'Made in 3 fun, camo colors and built for outdoor play.', 'Light and easy to throw, which makes it ideal for games of fetch.', 'Includes 3 textures that dogs love, to keep your BFF engaged.']

title: Smart Pet Love Tender Tuff Tug Squeaky Plush Dog Toy
descriptions:
