reviews: [This toy was completely not worth it. We are huge Star Wars fans and got very excited when we saw this. When it finally arrived, our puppy basically shredded the back of it within 10 minutes of taking it out of the box., Very poor quality. Within 5 mins of giving her this, it had the holes in it that you can see in the picture. 10-15 mins later & it’s as you see here. She was shredding it fiber by fiber in her bed with ease. My thumb is in the hole she made within 20 mins of getting it to give size reference along with the dog that did the damage. She’s a 50 lb hound mix (rescue at 3 months old, no idea of actual breeds involved but her ears tell a lot!) & I’m a 6’1” 190 lb average male with a handspan of 9” from pinky to thumb for further reference. I wouldn’t recommend this at all unless your dog literally is the lightest chewer ever. My girl is an average chewer and she tore this apart within 30 mins. That, Worst toy that I have ever received from Chewy. One side of it was a very thin mesh like material that my 40 lb dog chewed thru in 5 minutes., My 4 month old puppy chewed it up (see picture) within 10mins. Very disappointed of the stitching and quality, Fell apart after after 2 minutes of use!! And my dog is not a toy-destroyer., When I bought this toy the picture did not show the fluff on one side. My puppy loves to eat that so I was disappointed that I was not informed of this. I’m glad to see that the pictures are better and truest depict what the toy looks like. My 12lb morkie demolishes this in less then 30mins, I supervised him and was able to prevent him from eating the fluff but his little teeth tore up the smooth side. I threw a Star Wars themed bday for my puppers so I was excited for this toy but it was a huge let down.]

title: Dogit Minty Knotted Rope Tough Dog Toy, Large
descriptions:
['Freshen up that doggie breath with the Dogit Minty Knotted Rope Dog Toy. This mint-flavored rope toy massages teeth and gums and freshens breath as dogs chew. Hearty knots give pups something to really chew on, while the twisted rope provides traction during tug of war.  Made of natural fray-resistant cotton fibers, this durable toy will give your pup hours of healthy chewing and play.', '

                        See all items by Dogit
']
key_benefits: ['Rope toys are a favorite of all types of dogs.', 'Natural cotton fibers are durable and resist fraying.', 'Fresh minty flavor that pups will love.', 'Big knots let pups chomp hard.', 'Encourages natural chewing behaviors for strong teeth and gums.']
reviews: [My Cooper loves having a nice tug rope around the house and this rope is the perfect length and strength for our tough guys chewing needs., rope tears easily find pieces of rope in their poop nervous to let play with anymore in fear causing blockage, I purchased this for the dogs and the cats have played with these. Great quality for a cat as they get this by their claws and put to their stomach and just try to shred it without success. Hours of fun., my two dogs love this toy. they play tug of war with it and they play until they are tired out., Great toy for big dogs !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!, No mint in this it’s a boring rope my boys ignore it, I have 2 220lbs mastiffs they love to chew on this]

title: Pet Qwerks Rope Ring Tough Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your pooch will rope you into a game of pug-of-war with Pet Qwerks’ Rope Ring Dog Toy. This braided rope ring paw-vides hours of fetching fun and will soon become a fur-avorite. While you’re not always free to play, this toy is the paw-fect size for him to toss around all on his own—for satisfying independent play too. With a durable fiber and nylon construction, this toy can be enjoyed by teething pups and playful adults.', '

                        See all items by Pet Qwerks
']
key_benefits: ['Heavy-duty design is great for pug-of-war, fetch and toss with your playful pooch.', 'Braided rope paw-vides hours and hours of fun.', 'The ideal size for him to toss it by himself during independent play.', 'Paw-fect for teething pups and playful adults.', 'Durable fiber and nylon construction for confident play.']
reviews: [Bought this for my parents' two Australian Shepherds to play with, but it only took the older one about ten minutes to chew through the braids and unravel a good portion of the circle. They had fun playing tug with it for the first few minutes while it was whole, though! I would only recommend this for dogs who don't actually chew/shred rope bones., My girls love rope toys! It is their favorite tug toy. I figured this one would be fun because of its shape. They didn't even get a chance to tug with it before my smaller dog (48lb pit mix) had it starting to unravel and it is no longer a circle :( It took all of maybe 10 minutes. Smaller dogs or dogs that don't have such a power chew would probably love it. Sadly, my girls love it, it just didn't hold up long., My six month old puppy destroyed this in 24 hours. No lie. This is supposed to be for a large dog. A large chihuahua maybe., I purchased this toy to have in my home when my grand dog comes over. She is very active and tends to destroy all past toys I’ve purchased for her. Because of our “stay in place” lifestyle right now she has not been over to try it out so I gave it 3 stars till I can give a true review, I have a Great Dane and it was destroyed with in a hour. Very disappointed, My 5 month old Rottweiler chewed through it in minutes.]

title: Rogz Scrubz Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
['Play time with your pup just got a whole lot more fun with the ROGZ Scrubz Dog Toy. Made from thick, woven, cotton-polyester blended rope, this toy emits a fun “crackle” sound that entices and entertains your dog. A sturdy loop handle allows you to hold on firmly for a game of tug and gives you that extra fling while playing fetch. Chewing on the durable rope helps keep your best friend’s teeth clean and healthy by removing plaque and tartar buildup; the playful fringe and large knot allow for even more fun chewing variety.', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Rogz
']
key_benefits: ['Made from thick, woven, cotton-polyester blended rope; emits a fun “crackle” sound that entices and entertains your dog.', 'Sturdy loop handle allows you to hold on firmly for tug and gives you that extra fling for fetch.', 'Chewing the durable rope helps keep your best friend’s teeth clean and healthy by removing plaque and tartar buildup.', 'The playful fringe and large knot allow for even more fun chewing variety.', 'Small is 12.5 inches long, medium is 17.2 inches long and large is 21.2 inches long.']
reviews: [I have 2 Corgi puppies. They love these Rogz Scrubz toys. They have been thru 5 of them. They are very rough on their toys so I have to keep an eye on them because before you no they have totally unraveled the rope. But they like them an keeps them busy., I ordered a large for my LARGE dog, but I was send a small. My dog picked it out of the box to play with it. She immediately latched on to my fingers with her puppy teeth. I don't know why I have this size, but I will review it. The hand grip for humans is so small that I can only get three fingers in the loop (I am a woman with slim hands). This is ungainly and difficult to control play. The toy is too thin and the knot is too small as is the tail. This is not a good pull toy for any dog., Our dog loves to play tug with this toy. It's a strong and generous size toy for our 60 lbs pittie. Note...toy is not meant to leave out unsupervised with known chewers. We only bring this out when we can play with our dog. He loves the interaction., My 10month old giant schnauzer tore this in one day. I wouldn’t recommend for chewers!, Our senior princess loves this toy! It’s light enough that she can move with it and the different chew options make for great viewing pleasure ...., I have three dogs that all love this toy. It is their go to toy when they want to engage with each other or their chosen human. They last well, one of them after a run through the mower, still usable and safe., I bought these for my terrier mix and shih tsu a month ago. My shih tsu destroys most fabric toys within minutes, but this toy has withstood his chewing. I bought the small and it's the perfect size for them to carry around. They both love this toy., My dog loves this toy during training. It is small enough to keep in my pocket and not too big for her small mouth., This is the second order for this toy. I have two Shitzu mix dogs who are heavy chewers and this toy lasted much longer than anything else I have bought them., This is a great toy for cats who like to chew. I have a cat who loves to chew on his toys and has destroyed many of them. This toy is very durable and he loves chewing on it.]

title: ZippyPaws Skunk Jigglerz Dog Toy
descriptions:

Added crinkle material in the head and tail make this skunk an engaging noise-stravaganza for playing pups. Made of thick Cordura with cross-stitching to resist rough play, this skunk is also stuffingless to prevent messes when there is a tear.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by ZippyPaws
']
key_benefits: ['All Jigglerz toys have an exclusive noisemaker that squeaks when shaken.', 'Crinkle sounds emanate from head and tail when jostled.', 'Thick Cordura material, strong stitching and no stuffing make this a tough, mess-free toy.', 'Great for dogs of all ages and sizes.', 'Elongated shape makes it great for carrying around and shaking.']

title: Rogz Cowboyz Knot Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
['Rogz Cowboyz Knot Dog Toy is a force to be reckoned with against all other rope toys. Not only does it clean your pup’s teeth as he plays, it also squeaks to provide endless excitement for your four-legged friend. This toy is perfect if you’re looking to bring out Fido’s natural hunting instincts. Rating a whopping 4 on the Bite-o-Meter, your pooch won’t be able to get enough!', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

']
key_benefits: ['Helps to clean teeth and prevent tartar buildup, promoting healthy teeth and gums', 'Squeaks to spark any pup’s interest', 'Perfect fetch toy to bring out your dog’s natural hunting instincts', 'Doubles as a squeak toy and fetch toy', "Comes in a variety of vibrant colors: you choose the size, we'll ship the color at random for a fun surprise!"]
reviews: [Within a week our aggressive chewing terrier had chewed off the extensions from the ball. Also, for a 12 lb. dog, the knot was extremely hard and too heavy to throw for her to fetch., I have two little dogs. One is a squeaker killer and the other just likes to shred things. I have had this for a month or more and they have not been able to destroy it. They both love it., This toy lasted about one hour before my 7 month Siberian Husky starting ripping off the "tail" pieces while playing tug. One day later we are down to 3 tails left on this toy. I was also expecting the rope ball portion to last. But not even a day later, he has broken through the rope ball portion. I'm very disappointed with this toy and would not recommend this to any dog that is a heavy chewer. It simply won't last. Use your money elsewhere!!, Since our Labrador was tiny she plays with something we named Mr Blue and loves it til this day! I wanted something larger as she has grown ! It’s hard finding toys that can hold up! BUT MEET MR ORANGE! She is so happy and runs around with him hanging and tossing it !, Our Rescue dog chews everything and this has survived the week. She loves to chase and tug and had even flipped it in the pool. It was retrieved and continues to give her fun., My two 2 year old puppies really liked this toy-it was durable enough to withstand the tugging and pulling. It lasted longer than other toys of this design/style., Our doodles really love playing with this fun toy together. Keeps them occupied and works alone or for tug-of-war!, My litter of Goldendoodle puppies have decided these are their favorite toys! All 11 love this toy so much. I have ordered them three times and they hold up great and I put them in the washer and dryer!, My dogs love this toy they play tug a war with each other . Strong, My dog had it unraveled in 5 minutes. Very disappointed]

title: Chuckit! Mountain Rope Tug Tough Dog Toy, Small
descriptions:

Mountain Rope Tug Toy is great for multi-dog households and the perfect way to enjoy some interactive fun with your paw-tner.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. reviews: [my big puppy (85 plus pounds) really likes playing tug with this toy. I"m not sure how long it will hold up to her very hard pulling but it is a good size for her and she will have fun with it till she breaks it. It is pretty strong but definitely not indestructible. I will buy another one after this one succumbs to her intense play style., My Labrador is terrible on toys ! This rope I have to put up bc he gets too excited with it wanting to sling it around inside ( it’s an “outside “ toy !) but he almost hyperventilates whe I pull it down ! I’ve had this literally 4 years ( taking pictures to show how little wear!), WE have CHUCKIT balls and my great dane and mastiff puppy love them, so I thought I was making a good choice with this tug toy. I am now throwing a fairly expensive toy in the trash within 12 hours. The pup chewed thru the plastic and the rope is coming apart., This toy does have a long rope for tug of war. It will not hold up if your dog is a chewer. This only lasted 2 days before the dog chewed thru the rope., Great for tug of war, but definitely would not recommend leaving a puppy/dog alone to chew on, since it will come apart., Our dogs love to tug at this rope. They are both labs and this rope gets quite a workout., Cool idea for a product, but construction was pretty poor. Chewed it up in a matter of a couple days., My 7 month old English Setter destroyed the rubber and rope in an hour. Not worth the money., 70lb pittie mix pup freaking loves this thing. He loved to tug. He will sit in front of the closet we keep it in waiting for me to get it out. That being said we do that to keep it put away definitely not something to leave out with the super chewers. Its kinda starting to fall apart already from all the pulling and one of the orange pieces has slide completely off from holding on to it. I'd say it's not worth the $12 if its just gonna fall apart in I'd say a month or so. Weve had it for about two and a half weeks at this point and play with it every other day for a good 20 minutes., Great dog toy. My dog and I get a lot of exercise.]

title: HuggleHounds HuggleHide Bone Dog Toy
descriptions:

Made from all-natural rawhide, it features tanned water buffalo hide in the middle and comes in the shape of a bone for your furry friend to enjoy. This bone is stuffed with cotton rope and includes a leather wrap around the middle with a heart on it. This eco-friendly toy also helps clean your paw-tner’s teeth and exercises his jaw muscles for added benefits. Whether your companion enjoys a game of fetch or just wants a chew toy, the HuggleHounds HuggleHide Bone Dog Toy will provide him with hours of amusement.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

']
key_benefits: ['Bone toy that gives your furry friend a new take on a classic plaything.', 'Made from all-natural rawhide with tanned water buffalo hide in the middle.', 'Features cotton rope stuffing to provide enhanced chewing sensation for your pup.', 'Helps clean your paw-tner’s teeth and exercises his jaw muscles.', 'Ideal as a fetch or chew toy for your companion.']
reviews: [My dog just destroyed this in 2 minutes. If your dog is a chewer don't do it., I found this toy when looking for a durable chew toy for our Boston terrier. He loves to chew on squishy toys and was thrilled to get this, unfortunately it only lasted a short while the first afternoon before he had chewed threw and was eating the braided inside. On to continue the search for a more durable toy..., My one year old Golden Retriever had this destroyed in about 10 minutes. We had to take it away and throw it in the garbage. Total waste of money!, She had it apart and starting to chew apart the ends in an hour. I was hoping it would last longer., I was pleasantly surprised with this toy. I have a heavy chewer. This toy was perfect for him. I will purchase more when they are back in stock.]

                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

reviews: [I had faith that this toy would be a good fit for my lab based on my past experience with Nylabone products. I was wrong. This toy lasted a very few minutes before it was in bits and pieces., Our two boxers are super chewers. They typically destroy their toys within minutes of getting them (including "indestructible" ones). This toy has lasted more than a week and they both are playing tug with it. One of the ropes is starting to shred - but hey! it's ok as it has lasted far longer than I thought it would., My dog loves rope toys but they aren’t always durable. I thought that I would give this toy a try and he loves it! We can tug, he can shake it and chew on the rubber part., My dog loves this toy! The straps are very durable my dog has not destroyed it. One of his favorite toys.]

title: Frisco Ballistic Nylon Plush with Rope Squeaky Astronaut Dog Toy
descriptions:
['This toy is one small step for pups and one giant leap for interactive fun! This toy is perfect for your little explorer of the stars when they’re in play mode. It’s smooth ballistic nylon to keep playtime going and lots of squishy stuffing with a rope toy attached to the back. So, no matter how your pup wants to play—fetch, catch or tug—this toy is up for it. Blast off into fun with this toy from Frisco!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Frisco
']
key_benefits: ['Plush astronaut toy is made for you and your pup to have some out of this world fun.', 'Covered in ballistic nylon with astronaut suit accents, lots of squishy stuffing and an attached rope toy on the back.', 'Includes a squeaker stuffed inside the astronaut’s head and body so your dog can have lots of loud playtime and stay interested.', 'Great for fetching and catching when your dog is in playmode, with lots of erratic, bouncy action.', 'Made to bring some extraterrestrial cuteness to your dog’s toy collection.']
reviews: [This astronaut was really cute and I liked that it was soft to throw on the wood floor without scratching and it had a rope to be able to snatch it from my dog's mouth without being gross. It seemed like the fabric was a tough material that might withstand my dog's rough chewing. However, it only lasted 4 hours before my boy was able to rip it open and get out the squeaker and stuffing., My dog is a tough chewer, so the material for this toy is great. The Nylon lasts longer than most plush toys. I also love that a rope is included with this astronaut so I can play with him too. I love that Frisco came out with a space line. I love anything having to do with space so this was a must for my little alien pup. Overall, my pup and I love this toy. #chewyteamrated, Do I have to give this to my dog?! This is too cool. I love it has the rope attached that way I can tug o war with my pup to see who gets to keep it. :) #ChewyTeamRated]

key_benefits: ['Ball shape is perfect for clawing, chewing, tossing and playing fetch.', 'Sturdy construction provides a welcome distraction from stress and separation anxiety.', 'Can help discourage clawing or chewing on your belongings and furniture.', 'Provides relief for clawing kitties and teething puppies.', 'Great stimulation for cats and small dogs of all breeds and ages.']
reviews: [I loved this item because it lasted longer than others that I have purchased before. It is quite heavy and the knot is tightly tied and that made it withstand the chewing from my dog. I’m thinking of getting another one for my brother’s dog, This is a sturdy toy slightly smaller than a soccer ball. It's cute and durable as long as your dog isn't a manic biter., After throwing the ball for about an hour it began to come apart...wasn’t a wise choice!, 30 minutes after taking it out the box it started to come apart.]

reviews: [My small pit terrier had this chewed up in 30 minutes.. great for tugging but not chewing., The description of this toy led me to beleive that it was durable. My doberman had a piece ripped off within 20 mins. of giving it to him, and I had to throw it out. Waste of money., My schnauzer is a very strong chewer and goes through a lot of toys. title: GoDog Rope Tek Ring Dog Toy, Pink, Large
descriptions:
['Show your furry friend a fun time with the GoDog Rope Tek Ring Dog Toy. It features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope to create a toy that stands up to tough play. This toy is made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials and Chew Guard Technology to be safe yet strong. This rope is also soft on the gums of your pup for more enjoyable playtime. Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war, GoDog Rope Tek Ring Dog Toy will quickly become your companion’s new favorite plaything.', '

                        See all items by GoDog
']
key_benefits: ['Durable rope toy made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials.', 'Features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope.', 'Soft on the gums of your furry friend for more enjoyable playtime.', 'Made with Chew Guard Technology for durability and dependability.', 'Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war anywhere you take your paw-tner.']
reviews: [I recommend it for tug of war. It's intention is for tug of war and it holds up very well for that between either human vs beagle or beagle vs beagle. One beagle is an aggressive chewer and has torn away some rubber so I give it to the dogs only when I'm with them. When the aggressive chewer wins and wants to chew it, I swap it out for a cow's knee cap or buffalo horn that I buy in bulk on Chewy., Had to take the toy away after 3 minutes because it was in so many little pieces., I bought this would be the perfect toy for my 15 lb. dog who likes to chew. The salesperson said it was made for heavy chewers and should be perfect for him. N O T !!!!! In less than 10 minutes, he had torn a piece of runner away from the rope section, and had started shredding the rope. Not a very tough toy at all! Thoroughly disappointed and feel like I really wasted my money and that the product was falsely recommended., Love this toy! Last much longer than most other chew toys we’ve tried!, My great dane loved it but chewed up one of the balls within 1 hour and had to take it away from her., It only lasted about a week before my dog had it dissembled, My lab literally ate half of this ring in 10 minutes.]

title: Petique Eco Pet Ball Python Tough Squeaky Hemp Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Have your next tug of woof with the Petique Eco Pet Tough Ball Python Hemp Dog Rope. Your dog will love chewing on the natural hemp material that’s designed to stand up to all types of ruff-housing. Complete with a fun squeaker inside, this snake is anything but sneaky. Great for chewing, tugging and fetching, your pupper will want to bring his new python dog toy with him everywhere. If it gets pulled through the grass one too many times, just toss it in the washer for an easy clean-up.', '

                        See all items by Petique
']
key_benefits: ['Includes a squeaker inside for extra fun.', 'Constructed from non-toxic hemp fibers, a great alternative to synthetic toy materials.', 'Machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Built tough for tons of precious playtime memories.', 'A hiss-terical gift for the doggo in your life!']
reviews: [I really love this Python and so does my dog. It has four loud squeakers and one chew ball at the end, I put the python on top of my dog crate so she can have a friend to look at. Sometimes I put it in the crate. My puppy likes to fall asleep with the python under her head., Sadly within 5 minutes of play the head which is full of stuffing was ripped open & pulled out. I have a 2 year old Weimaraner & a 7 month old Weimaraner that love to play tug with each other. This product states that it is Tough & great for Rough Tug & play. DEFINITELY NOT STRONG IN THE HEAD OF THIS SNAKE. However, I did manage to make this toy hold up. I realized that the body is strong. It has 6 balls knotted individually to make up the length of the body that is about 2 feet in length. I simply cut off the head & now it seems to be a Strong Tough Tugg Toy. They have now been playing with it NONSTOP for the past day without the head & they Love it. I gave this 3 Stars because the Body Seems, I love this toy! It’s WAY larger than I expected (it’s about 2 feet long!!) and our spaniel has a blast tugging it around and playing with all the squeakers. The only downside is that the head is a little flimsy, so it would probably break easily with a strong biter. If your dog is smaller or doesn’t like to tear toys open though, I bet you’ll be fine!! Very fun toy, My dogs are obsessed with squeaky toys and playing tug. I was thrilled when this toy arrived. I did not realize how large it was and that there were so many squeakers! Unfortunately they ripped the head off before the end of the afternoon. I was sad, but the whippets don’t care. The body is intact. They still love it., This toy was destroyed by my 10 month old puppy in 3 hours]

title: Tuffy's Ultimate Tug-O-Gear Squeaky Plush Dog Toy, Red Paws
descriptions:
["Tough and long lasting, Use interactively with one or multiple dogs. It can be used to play Fetch or a Tug toy. Great toy to entertain multiple dogs for hours — soft edges won't hurt gums. Great for indoors! Washable! And floats!!", "The Tuffy's Series Toys are designed to be play toys and not chew toys. Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.", "

                        See all items by Tuffy's
"]
key_benefits: ['Made with multiple layers of material that are bonded and sewn together to make one "Tuff" Layer. Most toys have just one seam to hold the toy together, Tuffy\'s has 7. Webbing is sewn around the edges of the toy and then the edges are sewn together to make each toy extra Tuff. Each toy has soft edges that is easy on gums.', 'Contains 3 squeakers sewn into a squeaker safety pocket inside for an added layer of security', 'Floats in water and is machine washable (air dry)', 'Tuff scale: 9 out of 10', 'Tough and long lasting toy can be used interactively with one or multiple dogs over 20 lbs']
reviews: [I have a large breed dog, 14 months, and I find it hard to find toys he doesn't destroy in a short period of time. This toy has held up very well. He has fun playing with it and it hasn't come apart (yet)., Have a Lab/Malamute/Pitt-bull mix she tears everything up in minutes. This toy has lasted a month so far and still together!! Will be ordering more!!, My dogs love to play with this on their own or when they see the other playing, they will grab onto the other end and play together. They are tough chewers and this seems to be holding up well!, My lab mix can and does destroy every toy I buy her... but she's had this for a little over a week now and it is still in perfect condition!!! Highly recommended for aggressive chewers!!!, Dog loves it, for about 30 minutes. Then she tore a hole in it and stuffing was everywhere. I bought the ultimate rated of their line and it was awful., These are the best plush toys I have found for my little super chewer. She’s a bit mix and destroys most toys in under an hour. These last us a couple of weeks before she can find a string and get the stuffing out. Plus it’s fun for a game of tug of war., My 2 year old bernese mountain dog is a rough player so he needs a toy we can play with that doesn't fall apart after 2 sessions. reviews: [Fell apart easily and the cover fell off the ball. The dogs played with it but it didn’t last very long at all. It fell apart very easily and I had to throw it away, Great toy...very durable... just wished it had been just little smaller...does it come in a 3 1/2 or 4 inch?, Dogs chewed this open the first day they got it. I had to be picking up pieces of the ball outside & in the house. The toys seem like they’re of good quality but my one pit bull/American boxer mix pulls everything apart. Speaks fo itself, per picture., My Staffordshire pitty had this destroyed within a day to the point I took it away from her because she was literally eating the tennis ball - they need to make this of thicker harder durable material, Held up for half a day before the ball cracked in half now there is tennis ball pieces everywhere and the rope unraveling sooner than I expected, we found a similar one at a discount store a while back and it was his favorite toy, but he is about 85 lbs and goes through toys quickly. That one lasted about 4 months a new record! When we saw this one on chewy in the teal color we had to get it. He loves swinging it around and he smiles when he carries it. A staple for his toy bucket, I wasn't sure if my dog who loves plush toys would go for this guy, but she loves it! Great for tug o war and won't break!, Both labradors love this. Only had a few days, but so far has remained intact.]

title: Jax and Bones Louie the Lobster Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Louie the Lobster Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jax and Bones
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [Purchased for an adult Irish Wolfhound and a 4 month old Irish puppy. Within hours they had removed the black "cord" that was holding the rope together and began unraveling the lobster. Not well made and certainly not for large dogs as recommended by chewy., I bought this thinking it would help with her puppy teething but the toy is so flimsy that I gave it to her and in 2 minutes she ripped off the rope ends (where it’s balled up). She has never destroyed any other toy I’ve given her this quickly. Even the other toy I bought with this order (the squirrels one) she hasn’t torn apart. Unfortunately I can not recommend and had to throw away already., Perfect for my 9lb toy poodle. He loves it. The ‘arms’ pull back and forth thru the body as he plays, so he pulls one way then switches sides to get it back! Very entertaining for him (and us). Toy is holding up with his vigorous chewing., We bought a rope lobster from ll Bean while in Maine last May. Our dog loved it. In fact, he loved it so much, that by late July, he had completely shredded it. I was surprised to find that Chewy's sold them, so I ordered a large (Should have been a Jumbo) and "Frankie" took to it just like before. Who knew that an impulse purchase would turn out to be such a great one?, It's been nearly impossible for us to find a toy that our dog will play with. I bought him a Jax & Bones rope toy a few months ago and he immediately engaged with it. This is the 2nd toy from them that we've bought and he loves this more than the first. They are designed to fray with play, so don't be surprised when it starts to slowly unravel. We can't leave it sit out because I'm fairly certain our dog will destroy it all within 24 hours without supervision, which is the only reason it gets 4 stars. We're just happy we finally found a product he likes, but obviously won't be for every dog., I have 2 220lb masstives these are great they love to chew., I have a 10 month old Boxer and this thing went from cute lobster to a pile of string and rope within a half hour. Don't recommend at all. Not even for a light chewer. Very poorly tied together., My dog loves his raggedy lobster. Picture is worth 1000 words., So just like any other toy I buy my tough chewing Aussie this toy starting falling apart within minutes of pulling it out of the package. He's had so much fun with it though and the toy is so cute! Wouldn't spend the money on it again for him but for a more gentle chewer it would be perfect., Within an hour my dog had this toy unraveled. Not worth $20.]

title: Tuggo Water-Weighted Ball & Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Inspired by two dogs' fascination with a bowling ball, the Water-Weighted Ball & Rope dog toy from Tuggo was built to bring your dogs the playtime of their dreams. This exceptional ball can be weighed down using water, sand or gravel for a unique, customizable playing experience. Fill with as much or as little as you'd like for a maximum weight of a whopping eighteen pounds! Whether your pal plays with you or other dogs, the durable rope can be pulled from either end for serious tug-of-war action. Even if your pup plays alone, the water gives your dog the sensation that someone else is playing along with him. This leak-proof, adjustable, floatable and portable ball is sure to be your pet's favorite toy for countless days to come.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. ']
key_benefits: ['Built for durable, long-lasting play for you and your canine companion.', 'Fill with water, sand or gravel to create resistance for more challenging games of tug.', "Organic, cotton-based rope can be adjusted and tied to different lengths to suit your pal's playtime.", 'Healthy play keeps your dog active and inspires bonding between you and your pet—or even bonding between dogs.', 'Use various kinds of gravel or marble to make new, engaging sounds.']
reviews: [I have two pit bulls, one is a chewer and the other is not. They were able to play tug of war for about 2 mins until the rope started to break apart due to my chewer. It’s hard to find a good toy that stands up to aggressive chewing and this rope did not. On the plus side, the ball is made of a very hard material and I have high hopes that will last for a while. And another plus, is the rope is replaceable so you can exchange it with something stronger!, I really can't review this item. It was a gift for my sister-in-law's dogs. She has two large dogs that like to fight over toys in the backyard. My only surprise was how hard the ball itself was. It's a very firm plastic and I was thinking it was going to be something a little bit more malleable., Ordered and super excited. Put water in it and soon as digs played water was leaking. I checked for seal and tightness but no matter what water comes out. Very disappointed, Molly the Australian Shepard loved the rope but once she conked herself with the ball that was the end. The toy filled with water may keep doggie from shaking it with the rope and protect from the big bonk. However when the rope is finished doggie is left pushing the toy around as its too hard to bite. If your dog likes to chase and push this may be for you., First one I bought 6 years ago and they finally destroyed it. It lasted along time. Also great exercise for them. Fast delivery considering the circumstances right now. Love Chewy!, Came early and my dog second ball and he loves playing with it all time and it takes beating my bull terrier is very ruff with toys and is a power chewier as we say and this ball will last him s year and l would by more of them again on chewie, Dogs don't play with it tried everythibg and they are not interested at all., I’m so excited to finally find this ball again! My girl could play with this toy for hours and hours. So durable and long lasting. 5 stars from Molly!, My giant breed pup loves this toy, but tonight he flung it around and clocked his shoulder pretty good with it. He yelped like I hadn't heard him yelp before and he didn't want to put weight on that front leg for awhile (he's ok tho' as far as I can tell). I took it away now. It's too bad as he plays with it by himself frequently, and he loves to play tug-o-war with me as well. I've been hurt by it tho' too, and when he'd run with it, he'd keep his eyes closed as it hurts to get hit in the head too., I thought my Labrador would love it- WRONG she just thought the rope was another chew toy hard plastic ball was ignored]

title: Doggles Pentapulls Hedgehog Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a toy designed to stand up to extra-tough playtime with the Doggles Pentapulls Hedgehog Dog Toy. Its patented "X" design and super-stitched construction makes it perfect for extra-strength pulling, shaking, and tugging in any direction. Because it’s built completely out of one solid piece with flat embroidery and no attachment points, there are no toy parts that can be torn off by even the most energetic roughhousing! Thanks to its four layers of recycled ballistic nylon that resists tears and abrasions, it’s perfect for pups who love to rough-and-tumble. Plus, the tail and legs squeak when pressed, for the loud squeaking fun your pup loves. It’s lightweight enough to be easily tossed for a quick game of fetch with your furry friend, and cuddly for those more laid-back moments.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Doggles
']
key_benefits: ['Withstands extra-rough play with four super-stitched layers of abrasion-resistant, 1680D ballistic nylon, sourced from recycled water bottles.', 'Patented, seamless "X" design has no attachment points and is flat-embroidered for a truly tear-resistant toy.', 'Five loud squeakers inside give your dog the loud squeakability he loves.', 'Great for dogs of all sizes and comes in different characters to match your pup’s personality.', 'Easy to clean material makes it the ideal, go-to squeak toy for daily use.']
reviews: [I was initially impressed by the description of this tug toy which came up when I searched "tug toys for heavy chewers" in the Chewy search bar. However, the toy itself did not live up to my expectations. This doesn't seem to be made out of "one solid piece with flat embroidery" as my pup was able to pull off the face of the toy, exposing a softer, weaker fabric. From there, she pierced a hole and removed all the stuffing. I was hoping this toy would last us a little longer. She destroyed it in roughly 3 days, which I suppose is better than the 2 hours that I usually expect from a stuffed toy. I wish this toy had been more tear and abrasion resistant as the description led me to believe., This toy is descent, my pitbull had most of the legs torn of in one day, but he likes to still play with all of it. His favorite part is the middle he runs around with it and squeaks it. Then he plays tug of war with the legs he has torn off. So we now have several toys out of one. So if you want only one toy not so good but it you want several out of one toy then it's a good toy to order., My border collie had all the legs removed from the body in about 30 minutes, however he loves playing tug of war with all the leftover parts so it was like getting 6 toys for the price of one., My Goldens love to play tug with this, long pieces makes it easy for them to grab it]

key_benefits: ['This durable toy is a paw-fect option for tough-playing pups.', 'Multiple layers of durable materials and stitching are used to help extend the life of the toy.', 'The exterior of the toy is cross-stitched for added strength.', 'Paw-fect for solo play or for a game of tug-o-war between 2 or even 3 pups.', 'Machine washable and floats in water, making it the perfect pool pal or beach buddy.']
reviews: [Love this tug toy. It's my Boston Terriers' favorite toy. Playing vigorous tug, it lasts a while., Somehow I missed the description that this toy is for small dogs. key_benefits: ['Durable rope toy made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials.', 'Features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope.', 'Soft on the gums of your furry friend for more enjoyable playtime.', 'Made with Chew Guard Technology for durability and dependability.', 'Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war anywhere you take your paw-tner.']
reviews: [I have a 21 month old APBT who went to town on this thing as soon as I took it out of the box. Within 2 hours he started gnawing the rubbery stuff off and started chewing his way through the rope. I give it a 4 because after a few days the rope is still together, he is continuing to chew the rubbery stuff off and seems to like the thing. I’m on the fence about recommending it. If you have a dog that just likes tug of war - this thing is for you, if he likes playing tug of war then chewing what he was playing with, there’s gonna be a mess., I thought if I purchased a heavy durable rubber chew toy it would entertained my Beagle for weeks, as she's a chewer shredder. Oh, well. I didn't get my monies worth, she chewed through "GoDog Rope Tek Figure 8 Dog Toy" within 4 days. I was hoping for a month at the least. By the second day bits a pieces were all over the livingroom floor then the kitchen floor, well you get the picture. Cannot recommend!, Our chocolate lab loves this toy. Must supervise when he plays as he has been able to peel and chew off the edges of the rubber...that's why not a 5 star review. Easy for two big dogs to tug of war or even with one of us., We have a 7 month old 40lb super mutt who loves to chew. He loves this toy. He has not destroyed it like some reviewers noted, but he has started to make some very small cracks in the rubber...almost like tiny rubber shards that may break off. So, to be on the safe side, it’s coming to its end. That said, It’s great for fetch because it’s bouncy and works well as a tug toy. For a month, it’s been worth the cost. Some toys don’t last a day..., I ordered this toy because my dog kept chewing up and swallowing rope toys. This toy is a great alternative because it doesn't have the frayed ends she loves to eat. It also bounces and acts like a ball while still allowing for a great tug of war game., The toy got destroyed sighing a day of my lab mix having it. The rubber started falling off in pieces., My pack loves to play tug with each other, but they shred the traditional stringy rope style tug toys so I thought this would last longer. I was wrong. Didn’t even last a day and the rubber piece was torn off one side., After just 2 minutes of chewing on this.....don’t waste your money.]

reviews: [I love this toy! I have a pit mix and a spaniel who both have high energy, so this has withstood multiple tug of war sessions. Plus I brought it camping and it was super easy to clean!, My lab puppy destroyed thus in less than 5 minutes. Should be thicker uf u r going to advertise as a tug of war toy., Lasted less than a day. It's in 2 pieces. If you have a small to medium size dog, it will be destroyed FAST. Once a toy breaks from tugging, it quickly gets torn to pieces., My German shepherd broke this within 5 minutes of playing with it, My Twenty months old Doberman destroyed this in literally five minutes. I was very disappointed this toy didn’t last longer. This might be a good toy for a small puddle or a older dog that has no teeth. I would not recommend this product to anyone. Very flimsy and thin for a pull toy that stated for a large bread dog. Not happy with the product at all wast of money don’t wast yout money and time on this toy., My Golden loves this toy. He brings it over so we can play tug all the time. I love it because it's easy on my hands. So far, it's been very durable. No signs of breakage. My boy doesn't chew his toys, so that has not been an issue. I don't think it would hold up to chewing., My dog chewed through it within 3 days of having it., It’s my valley bulldogs favorite toy & easy for me to hang on during tug o war games!, This is made very nice and tough for the boy's to play with.They play hard and this will keep them busy for sure., My six month old puppy loves to play tug. His rope tug held up well but held odor so I had to wash it often. I wanted to try a tug made with a material that would not hold odor or stay wet after play. I believed the higher cost would be money well spent. Sorry to report that although my puppy and I loved playing tug with it , it lasted less than five games of tug. The Tuff Tug was not so Tough !]

title: Pet Qwerks Dog Toy Variety Pack for Large Dogs, 6 count
descriptions:
['Give your large pup a choice of toys with this Pet Qwerks Value Pack. It contains interactive and noise making toys to help your dog have a fun playtime and get some exercise. This pack comes with an X-Tire Ball Jingle, Pickle Fetch, Talking Babble Ball, Blinky Babble Ball, Krinkle Squeak newspaper and value-sized Peanut Butter Incredibubbles. That’s three heavy-duty balls, two fetch toys and some bubbles to keep your furry friend occupied for hours. Made specifically for larger dogs, this Value Pack from Pet Qwerks has everything you need for a howlin’ good time.', '

                        See all items by Pet Qwerks
']
key_benefits: ['Six different toys for a variety of fun for your large dog.', 'Pack contains fetch, noisemaking and exercise toys.', 'Incredibubbles are non-toxic and flavored for your pup’s enjoyment.', 'Chewing discourages destructive behavior in your furry friend.', 'Made in the USA!']
reviews: [For her first two birthdays she was not so excited, although she loved her puppy cookie cake (purchased on chewy). But this year that box of doggy toys was an absolute hit. We wrapped up the box and she opened it up and just went crazy, at first with caution because some toys made noises. But now she barks at the balls cause she realized they are voice (bark activated) and loved the crackle of the newspaper. Under our supervision she started to dismantle it, so we had to take it away but we ordered two more. We highly recommend this box of toys for our large Terrier, Plot hound brindle puppy girl. She also loves the musical birthday cake with candles that she got for her first birthday!, Most things from chewy I love! I thought this looked like a good deal for our 2 big puppies, it looked like 6 toys for $40, not bad, when I got it my son opened it before I got a chance to see it and it’s those hard tires with a bell inside, fine if your dogs like that, mine are scared of bells, 2 hard plastic balls that talk that again will be fine for someone else maybe but with a 7 year old boy these are going to get left in the rain, cracked, and the dogs can’t pick them up, and bubbles, the bubbles are very small, the dogs hate them and my son spilled half of them before I saw them (my fault) but I think they were put in there as a filler because I could get more bubbles at the dollar store, The soft toy and the pickle in a rope lasted no more than 5 minutes each. Very disappointed. Made this a very expensive purchase. Can’t believe it was recommended for large dogs. Not sure it would be good for small dogs either. The babble ball was the cheaper version that does not light up., My little buddy loves it! The babble balls keep him entertained for hours. I don’t have to do anything just watch him play., Loved the toys especially the babble balls. Only problem the batteries were dead in the flashing one due to the tab being pulled out. Other than that he has great fun with all his toys.]

key_benefits: ['Six different toys for a variety of fun for your large dog.', 'Pack contains fetch, noisemaking and exercise toys.', 'Incredibubbles are non-toxic and flavored for your pup’s enjoyment.', 'Chewing discourages destructive behavior in your furry friend.', 'Made in the USA!']
reviews: [Though I have not tried all the toys in the set, I can tell you that I already see false advertising with the toys my dog did play with today. I gave him the newspaper fetch toy, and in 10 minutes it had a hole in it, and on top of that, it does have stuffing even though the description of the set says stuffing free. I also gave him the rope tire toy, and he was swinging it around so much I had to take it away so he would not break our TV., The toy with the bell smells awful! The blue ball doesn't make any sound, which is disappointing because it's too hard to be a chew toy so it basically does nothing. The bubbles are really sticky and gross. Would not recommend., My dog loves the babble balls.and although they don't last very long his pure delight when they arrive makes it worth it. When I saw this set I was excited thinking it would be a great value but the additional items were crap. The bubble dispenser is so small that the majority of the goo ended up on the floor, the rope toys lasted about 20 seconds and the newspaper toy was worthless. I will get the babble balls again because like I said my pooch loses his mind for them but the rest of the pack was a complete waste of money and my time picking up the remains SMH, The rope toys were flimsy. They frayed quickly. The plastic of the pickle was very thin and weak. The bell of the tire toy came out with limited use and the tires were quickly chewed apart. Disappointing.]

Within two hours my Belgian Malinois tore one of the handles off., He loves chewing and tugging and after one week the only casualty has been the squeaker. reviews: [The glowing plastic is cool looking and is fun for the dogs at dark. However, it needs to be a bit thicker to withstand rigorous play. My lab loved it and still does, duct tape and all., Due to my schedule, I thought something that could be seen in low light would be fun. My Lab immediately loved it. He carries it around with him in the house and outside. He chews on the soft rubber rim, and carries it with the firm center. He got a back paw through an opening then it was hysterical watching him try to figure out why he couldn't pick it up without his hind leg moving forward also. Maybe he'll want to play catch with it sometime. But for now, it's HIS and who would argue with a Lab puppy that's adopted a toy?, This broke in the glowing section the first time it was thrown. The dog then chewed on it for less than 10 seconds and tore up the surrounding blue section in 2 different areas., When I received the part it look good and sturdy. when I'm playing with my dog the second time I threw the toy it cracked the plastic piece the middle try to glue it but did not work ended up throwing it away. My dog is a Goldendoodle she's very gentle on toys, First night out using the center plastic broke. Very poor quality! Would highly not recommend! Waste of money!, my 20 lb boston terrier had the outer ring ripped very quickly., This roller is wonderful! Strong well made and my dog loves it when it bounces across the yard! It's a keeper!, This is not a frisbee at all but I love it. I’ve been searching for a lightweight durable replacement for the frisbee with a hole in the middle but had no luck, nerf one was too heavy & a lighter version had a hole too big in the middle it’s get stuck on his head. Backyard isn’t massive so I prefer that you can roll/bounce this along the ground. Often the frisbee would go in the neighbors yard this still goes the length of the yard but on the ground. I’d recommend it. Haven’t tried the glow in the dark feature usually we play during the daylight hours., It was BROKE with in 5mins of dog playing with it., I got this toy in August 2017, I have a 1 year old 55 pound hound mix that can destroy a brand new tennis ball in under an hour. He is a power chewer if left alone with a toy after a long game of fetch, and he also loves to play tug of war. I'm a 195 pound 22 year old ex collegiate athlete I'm no slouch in the gym and when we play tug of war he can knock me off balance when he really pulls. All that being said this toy is awesome because we have used it at least 5 days out of every week since I got it and the thing is just as solid as the day we got it. This is a roller toy not a flyer, meaning its meant to be thrown like a wheel and rolled on the ground not thrown like a frisbee. If the toy ]

descriptions:

Inspired by one of nature’s favorite lounging critters, your best bud will love to tug on this rugged but cuddly panda plushie. Made with real mountain climbing rope, it can endure your dog’s ruff play—a perfect toy for fetch and tugging. Built strong for chewing and longtime play, the rope toy is ideal for teething puppies.', '

', '

key_benefits: ['Fun, interactive toy inspired by nature’s cutest, most relaxed critters.', 'Made with real mountain climbing rope, this toy can endure your pup’s chewing and tugging.', 'Supports an active lifestyle—to help keep your dog happy, healthy and fit.', 'Perfect mix of rugged and cuddly, the dual-textured toy is designed to hold your curious canine’s interest and provide hours of entertainment.', 'Ideal for all sizes and breeds.']
reviews: [I love zippy paws, but this one in particular lasted less than a day. Panda rips apart right away. Fabric thin., Advertised for small dogs. My 15 lb shih tzu trips over it....can't make it squeek. Big mistake!, Super cute toy! However I can only give this toy 1 star as it only lasted 1 day with my yorkie.]

reviews: [She gets so excited when she here's the FedEx truck she knows she's getting toys but this didn't last 10 minutes outta the box!, My tough chewer broke the rubber handle off within five minutes of giving it to her.]

title: Outward Hound Jute Puzzle Rope Tug Dog Toy, Green
descriptions:
['Give your furry friend an eco-friendly challenge with the Jute Puzzle Rope Tug Dog Toy from Outward Hound. Made from durable jute rope, this toy features rubber rings for your paw-tner to remove. Ideal for those pups that love to tug and problem solve, it has natural textures and scents to engage your sidekick even more. Outward Hound Jute Puzzle Rope Tug Dog Toy is as pet-friendly as it is eco-friendly and since it is made with natural materials, pet parents know this rope is safe for their canine companion.', '

                        See all items by Outward Hound
']
key_benefits: ['Durable puzzle toy made of natural materials your pup will love.', 'Rope is made out of jute, which is a natural plant-based fiber.', 'Features rubber rings for your paw-tner to remove.', 'Natural textures and scents will engage your furry friend.', 'Ideal for those canines that love to tug and problem solve.']
reviews: [Out of the box the toy had a strong plastic smell and my puppy was not interested. After airing out for a few days she began to play with it. Within an hour she had all of the knots undone and all of the plastic rings off. I tried to retie it but the rope is so soft it won't hold a knot., It took my 1 year old German Wirehair Pointer all of about 30 mins to totally dismantall this product. The ropes easily unbraid and then come apart. Leaving small pieces of rope everywhere., I’m not too happy with this product my dog tore most of the twine out of it within five minutes it wasn’t very sturdy and didn’t last very long honestly this is something I could’ve probably made on my own. Not too thrilled with it I guess it depends on the kind of dog you have but he’s not a pretty big destroyer of stuff and this only lasted me a few minutes I’ve definitely had a lot better rope toys, My Great Pyranese had this tore up within 24 hours!, The puppy and I both love this toy. It’s the first thing she pulls out of the toy box. The rubber rings are fun to chew and strong enough to withstand a big puppy. The rest of the toy is knotted rope which is easy to untie and straighten out and then retie. Big knots! Strong tugging! I think this toy will hold her interest over time., I bought this in spite of reviews. My big dog loves to chew and jute rope is one of his favs. That's why it got 3 stars. It "tugs" well,easy on the hands. BUT this should be an "outside toy". This dog's a "shaker" and the first good shake one of the rubber rings flew off and ricocheted off the wall(could have been tv). As he's chewed it, small lengths of the rope are everywhere., This did not last 5 minutes with our 5 month old German Shepherd. She loved it right away but the the jute came apart almost immediately., My shorkie shredded it in about a week, but he shreds everything. It served its purpose I guess lol., This was very poor quality for the price. My dog loves puzzle toys but unraveled the rope as soon as I gave it to him before he could even try the puzzle. The rope shredded and I had to throw it away in the first 5 minutes. It should say for small dogs only., This rope toy looked & sounded better before I purchased it. It only lasted maybe ten minutes between my three dogs. It says that it's challenging for dogs to take off the rings, but that's not true. Not the best toy purchase. But it was an okay price.]

title: Nerf Dog Tuff Tug Infinity Dog Toy, Medium
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a durable plush toy optimized for extra-tough tossing, fetching and roughhousing with the Nerf Dog Tuff Tug Infinity Dog Toy. Thanks to the unique infinity loop design that features two handles, it’s perfect for your dog to play tug of war—with you or with other friendly pups! Because it’s built with high-performance materials like sturdy woven nylon that can stand up to extra tough play, it’s the go-to toy for even the most active canines. Your pal will love chasing after it for hours on end—and because it also floats on water—it’s the perfect, unsinkable take-along toy for the beach, pool, lake, or your favorite water play spot.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Nerf Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Unique infinity loop shape is ideal for tossing, fetching, and playing tug of war.', 'Built to stand up to extra tough play with high-performance, durable woven nylon.', 'Provides an entertaining activity your pal can enjoy with you or other friendly pups.', 'Great way to add much-needed exercise to your dog’s daily activities.', 'Floating design makes it the perfect toy for the park, beach, or pool!']
reviews: [I have a 2-year old English Bulldog who is known to chew his toys fairly quickly, but this one only last two days. This toy was his Easter present. Gave it to him Sunday and by Tuesday evening it had two holes and was losing its stuffing. I had high hopes because I thought the NERF stuff was built tough, but he got through the stitching quickly., This really should be only used as a tuggy toy with supervision. I gave it to my dog to chase and in 5 minutes the stuffing was all over my yard., Our 2 year old Labrador tore a hole in this toy within the first ten minutes. He loves to tug with it, but it didn't last very long. :(, Bought this for my 3 month old Dobie and my 5 year old Dobie that like to play. Didn't last an hour until it was ripped and the stuffing coming out. Not at all tough like they advertised., My Frenchie played with it for less than 5 min then the stuffing on the blue handle started coming out!! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!! I'm surprised Chewy sells these cheap fragile toys., I was playing with this supposedly "tuff" toy with my dog for not even 10 minutes, and it has already fallen apart. Do NOT buy this product, it is not durable at all!, My 8 week old American Staffordshire puppy loved playing tug of war with me but after 4 days and her grabbing it and thrashing about and shaking it she ripped it open near the handles + was pulling the stuffing out which I saw immediately as I supervise her with her toys. Disappointed it did not last beyond 4 days., tuff enough to handle a puppy tearing it up and still ticking!, This toy lasts my super chewer several days - and takes her a couple days to get the whole thing destroyed - I get her one a month, Didn't last 2 days. My Pitbull and Austrian Shepherd love to play tug a war. This toy just started to shred after the second day. Not worth the $$$]

Inspired by the pull-tab on the top of everyone's favorite fizzy drink, it's a dizzyingly amount of fun for you and your toothy pooch. Made from a natural rubber compound that is non-toxic and biodegradable, the only thing you'll have to worry about is keeping up with your canine companion. Just toss it in the dishwasher when you notice it needs a deep clean. You’ll be back to having fun with your favorite furry friend in no time.", '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.

key_benefits: ['With individual handles designed specifically for you and your favorite pooch, you can join in on the fun during playtime.', 'Crafted with Puppyprene—a proprietary power-chewer rubber compound—for intense play.', 'Designed with tugging in mind, using a natural rubber compound that is FDA compliant, non-toxic and biodegradable.', "Dishwasher safe, so it's paw-sitively easy to keep clean.", 'Proudly made in the USA.']
reviews: [Friends wanted a tug toy that would stand up to their hefty, playful, lovable chocolate lab who chews things up in a flash. This toy has ample space for the owner's hand (without those rough spikey knobs like other toys), and the dog LOVES it! When playtime is over, the toy is put away so the dog doesn't continue chewing on it. It makes playtime more special when the tug toy comes out again., No way to play tug-o-war with this. Construction creates too many weak points and it was ripped in seconds. My dog loved to chew the rubbery toy but I fear that he may have eaten pieces and I took it away., Our 9 month Aussie pup destroys every toy he gets but this one! It is still in tact and he chews on it everyday. Going on 3 months now, I bought this for our family dog who loves playing tug of war and was happy to find a dog toy made in the U.S. But the first time we played with it he was able to pull chunks out of it while we were playing for only a few minutes. The toy was completely decimated in 2 days. Awful product, waste of money., Chewed on, pulled on and anything else strenuous. Still in one piece!]

reviews: [This toy looks like a rope but it's really just braided string that easily unravels at the end. My pup is a light chewer and within a few days had all the string unbraided down to the knots and the strings are easily pulled out so the dog can eat them. You'd think they'd seal or sew the rope at the ends so it doesn't fray so easily., My dog loves interactive play, and this toy is it. It’s fairly tough, with tight braiding being the main fabric component, which is then knotted. A squeaky ball is encased within the fabric, so he can squeak it, but not chew it out (yet!!). He’s had it for a few days, he shoves it in my face or lap, I grab an end, and we play tug o war, or I throw it for him. He loves sitting down and squeaking it for awhile too, and so far, so good, no exterior damage! I don’t expect any toy to last more than a week with him because he’s a tough chewer - Mastiff - Rottweiler mix, but I have high hopes for this. I don’t leave ANY rope toys or things that can be destroyed, out when I’m not home. Peanut , My dog love the squeaky ball in the middle and carried this with him everywhere for days until the ball finally fell out. Now he carries the ball everywhere. Needless to say my dog loves squeaky things!]

reviews: [One of my dogs pulled out the rope the first time we used it. Otherwise might be a great water retrieval toy., My Shepard/Lab puppy LOVES this. He will drag it around, retrieve it and play tug. The rope is thinner and not very strong (so it will need replacing if we keep tugging with it)., This toy lasted almost eight months before it started to chip. I ran it through the dishwasher every week or so and my pup went from about 10 weeks to 10 months and a bit with this as one of her faves. She loved to chase it and to play tug of war with it. The squeaker died a few months ago, but her interest did not wane. I’d recommend this one, especially in a multi-dog household, because two can play with Ray at the same time., I was excited to bring this home to my pup because she loves squeaky toys. It looks durable, but looks can be deceiving. The first toss of the toy part of the squeaky fell out, and now there is no sound at all. When is a company going to make a squeaky toy that actually works for longer than 2 seconds? Don't buy, We love this toy. Great for our active border collie(s) and fun to fetch. It's soft and gummy, so no teeth damage, but also very durable & thick. They seem to really like the shape+ the squeaker. I like that it has a rope, to keep you cleaner when throwing & ideal for "flinging". :) And it flies nicely when u throw it., Keeps our pup running and even when we have visits from our grand doggie, they tug together! We purchased another one !, Dog's favorite toys are squeakers and ropes, and this is the only toy I've found that has both. It seems really well made and durable - dog loves it!!!, My 3 Rotties love this toy!!!! My older Rotties has taken to sleeping with it, My dog loves this as a throw and fetch toy! The squeaker adds to her delight.]

title: Hartz Tuff Stuff Retriever Squeaky Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:

reviews: [Year old yellow lab is an expert at destruction. We keep a steady supply of chew toys headed her direction to keep her busy. She expertly sliced the cloth seam and so we removed the stuffing. Then she unraveled the knots and began her destruction of the rope. Tying the rope into knots again will hopefully stretch the life for a bit. I think this toy may be for the more refined pooches . It lasted several hours and to be fair, our dog is a chewing machine. When this toy was whole, she loved to pull on it and make it squeak., We had this for 2 hours and the dog destroyed it. I repaired it several times. The sewing needs to be better, Our dog had this not even for a day & it’s ripped and the stuff is coming out of it. It isn’t tuff like it is named because where the rope meet the red part wasn’t sewed together very well., Our dog is an aggressive chewer and we look for tough durable toys for her. This lasted seconds before she destroyed it., I admit we play hard but this didn't even last an hour of fetch and tug o' war. Seams frayed and stuffing started coming out., This lasted a couple days with my dog. I noticed some tears and then the cotton was everywhere today., Our 6 month old German shorthaired pointer loves it! Not chewed up yet, and I have left it in his kennel with him when we are gone., Lasted two days. Fell apart. Stuffing came out. Stitching came apart, Very disappointing dog toy. Lasted less than a month. The stitching came apart at the sides. The last toss it sank. Normal use of tossing into the water for my German Shepherd to retrieve. Only used this toy for water play time., My dog played with this toy for maybe 2 hours before it was torn apart. But he did have a great time and we were able to use the rope part for a few more days]

reviews: [Our 35 lb female border collie chewed the end off this toy in less than 10 minutes., We were looking for a sturdy toy for fetch as our pup could play fetch without ever stopping. She definitely loves this one and often picks it over her other toys., This is not meant for a power chewer. He had the small balls out of this in 10 minutes with supervision. I am very disappointed with many of the toys yu carry, not for rough chewers..., I have tendinitis in my elbow. I needed something that I could grip and twist in opposite directions. This Nerf Dog toy has just the right amount of resistance, and is very soundly built. As an added bonus it lights up and doesn't squeak. I doubt I will wear this out before my elbow heals., Nerf has made some durable toys that I have bought and will continue to buy, but this one lasted 5 minutes. My dog ate the ball out of one end within minutes... Had to throw it away immediately., My puppy ripped the rubber part of the toy the day it was delivered., Product info says great for the lake so I bought this for my Labrador to play with in the pond. Tested it in our baby pool and it immediately sank. One end lights up easier than the other. Fairly disappointed in this product., I purchased this toy because it had lights. The lights worked for about a week and then they quit working., My dog had this ripped apart within a day. Cool idea but not very durable., My pup loves this toy..only problem is that she destroyed it in just minutes. Ripped it up into little pieces.]

title: Jax and Bones Sidney the Seal Rope Dog Toy, Small
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Sidney the Seal Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jax and Bones
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [We play hall fetch every morning (we've got almost 70 feet of hallway) the wonderful rope toys we've been buying for years are no longer available. So I saw this and thought, okay safe vegetable dyes so let's try one. Luckily it was kinda pricey so I only ordered one as a tester. Well in under 3 minutes both flippers started to unravel. Once they came apart enough I tied the ends into knots, so we'll see how long this floppy flippered seal lasts. Betting nowhere near as long as the white 9 inch rope toys at almost half the price. Kinda disappointed in this product so far., Got this for my pup when he was teething and it helped for a bit then he destroyed it in minutes. It’s been hard to find anything that won’t be in pieces. I would of love this if it wasn’t for that., My lab tore through this within minutes. It is very cute but the rope isn't tied up very tight so she unraveled it quickly and I had to take it away as she started pulling pieces off. Disappointed because its a bit pricey. She has other rope toys that lasted much longer, Our 9 week old Lab loves this toy..and with those teeth it is a wonder he is still functioning...but he is., My dog is a chewer and makes quick work of most soft toys. She is really enjoying the multiple ropes that come together to make this toy and the challenge of destroying each one! Although she is destroying it, I am pleased with the amount of time it's lasted and her continued interest. I would definitely buy this or something similar again., My dog is small but is a big chewer. He often destroys toys quickly and I hate the idea of sending so many dog toys to the landfill. I tried giving him recyclable chew toys but he doesn't seem to like the rubbery texture and prefers fabric toys. Since the description for this toy said it is compostable I thought to give it a try and so far it's a winner! It might not be the most durable (my dog was able to get some edges to start fraying the first day he got it) but no toy is indestructible anyway and I feel better knowing that this toy can eventually go into the compost bin rather than the garbage. Also, even though there is some fraying I just trim the loose ends with scissors and he can keep, I googled tough pet toys for chewing dogs and this came up first. My dog had it chewed open in 10 minutes and had stuffing pulled out shortly thereafter. She loves to play fetch with it and I recommend it for anyone who's dog doesn't eat every toy she gets.]

descriptions:

Your doggo will love playing with his new rattle snake dog toy everywhere he goes. A squeaker inside the toy adds a whole other dimension of fun for your pupper. key_benefits: ['Handmade from non-toxic hemp material.', 'Complete with a squeaker for extra fun.', 'Cleans up easily in your household washing machine.', 'Your dog will love tugging, fetching and chewing this durable toy.', 'Great eco-friendly alternative to other toys made using synthetic products.']
reviews: [I have a 1.5 yr old Treeing Walker Coonhound. There is no doubt she is a super chewer. I went to this website to see if there were any tough toys to outlast my pup. The average was less than 1 day per toy. I am very disappointed with this product and think Chewy should "REMOVE" this product from their super chewer catagory. The tag is misleading. After spending over $60 on toys for my dog to have it destroyed so quickly is ridiculous, Admittedly I have a chewer, but this dog toy started with our dog 5/1 in the mid afternoon. By the evening my 32 lbs 8 month old puppy had pulled the squeaker out of the head and chewed partially chewed through the hemp rope. By the early evening (~ 7:30 PM) it looked like the photo. While I'm not surprised that he got through the plush parts fairly quickly I expected a much longer life from the hemp rope, This toy lasted less than 5 minutes with my pups. The rope literally shredded in about three minutes. Not worth the money!, Hard to believe that this was referred to as a "Tough" toy. It didn't even survive more than 10 minutes before the head and tail were removed. The whole thing is going in the garbage now as even the rope is in shreds., I thought the rope would provide a durable toy for my chewer but it lasted only about 30 minutes. On top of that as he shredded the rope, hemp fibers spread everywhere. Had higher hopes for this., Our 6 month old puppy ripped the tail off in less than 5 minutes, and he's not an aggressive player. Had high hopes for this eco friendly toy but sadly it is not of a good quality., My Yorkie ripped this to shreds in 30 seconds. I thought it might last a little longer., My dogs love it. They carry it everywhere and it lasts doesn’t fall apart., Unfortunately Walker had his head gone in the first day., We are always looking for non-toxic toys for our pup and the shelter. This seems to be that. Unfortunately, our angel had the - sort of - tennis balls out in not time. I think it's still usable as long as the head is intact, but would not recommend for shelter donations.]
