title: Tuggo Shake-N-Fetch Bowling Pin Weighted Dog Toy, 12-in, Red
descriptions:
["The Tuggo Shake-N-Fetch Bowling Pin is the perfect way to provide your dog with hours of physical activity all while having fun. Simply add water to turn this bowling pin into a weighted dog toy and adjust the amount of water until it's the perfect weight for your pup. You can even fill the Shake-N-Fetch Bowling Pin with rocks or sand for an enticing sound. Best of all, it can float, which means it’s paws-tively perfect for the beach, lake or pool. So, get your buddy a bowling pin and let the hours of interactive playtime and physical activity begin!", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Tuggo
']
key_benefits: ['Made with high-density polythelene for a durable design, plus it provides your pal with hours of fun and exercise.', 'The weight of the toy can be adjusted by adding or reducing the amount of water you put in the pin.', 'The Shake-N-Fetch Bowling Pin design makes it easy for your pup to pick up.', "Easily floats, so it's the perfect toy to bring with you to the pool, lake or beach.", 'The toy can also be filled with sand or rocks to add an enticing sound that your furry friend will love.']
reviews: [My pups got this toy from a friend as Christmas gift... they were not too sure about it ... not great interest until 6 months later when we decided to throw it in the pool! Oh boy why haven’t I done this earlier! They love it .... I’m buying a second one because they both want to play with it at the same time!, My rambunctious 2 yr old chocolate lab LOVES this floating toy, and self-plays with it at the lake, whether repeatedly pushing it off the dock to dive in after, or tussling with it in shallow water. You can adjust its wobble factor by increasing the amount of water you put inside. Incredibly durable, even this mega chewer hasn't destroyed it at all. Best purchase for my Bo!, My girl wasn’t interested in this, when I finally got her to interact with this toy, within less then a minute she walked away as if saying. . .ho hum, boring toy mom. So, I’ll add it to the donation box. For those who may be interested in trying this toy. . .the water does not leak out, as a matter of fact if you need or want to drain the water out, it requires a little effort.]

reviews: [Got this when It was more expensive and feel really ripped off. The ball basically disintegrated the second time we played with it. title: Doggles Pentapulls Flying Squirrel Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a toy designed to stand up to extra-tough playtime with the Doggles Pentapulls Flying Squirrel Dog Toy. Its patented "X" design and super-stitched construction makes it perfect for extra-strength pulling, shaking, and tugging in any direction. Because it’s built completely out of one solid piece with flat embroidery and no attachment points, there are no toy parts that can be torn off by even the most energetic roughhousing! Thanks to its four layers of recycled ballistic nylon that resists tears and abrasions, it’s perfect for pups who love to rough-and-tumble. Plus, the tail and legs squeak when pressed, for the loud squeaking fun your pup loves. It’s lightweight enough to be easily tossed for a quick game of fetch with your furry friend, and cuddly for those more laid-back moments.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Doggles
']
key_benefits: ['Withstands extra-rough play with four super-stitched layers of abrasion-resistant, 1680D ballistic nylon, sourced from recycled water bottles.', 'Patented, seamless "X" design has no attachment points and is flat-embroidered for a truly tear-resistant toy.', 'Five loud squeakers inside give your dog the loud squeakability he loves.', 'Great for dogs of all sizes and comes in different characters to match your pup’s personality.', 'Easy to clean material makes it the ideal, go-to squeak toy for daily use.']

title: Rogz Lighthouse Dog Toy, Large
descriptions:
['If your pup was born to swim, this toy is the perfect match for him! Its incredible buoyancy helps it stand up in the water and makes it easy to spot as it bobs in rough surf. The contrasting red and white stripes are specially visible to dogs and makes it easier for them to fetch their toy in any type of water conditions. This toy also has a cord that makes it a breeze to throw far, even for kids!\xa0', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Rogz
']
key_benefits: ['Its incredible buoyancy helps it stand up in the water and makes it easy to spot as it bobs in rough surf', 'The contrasting red and white stripes are specially visible to dogs and makes it easier for them to fetch their toy in any type of water conditions', 'Safe and comfortable on your dog’s teeth and gums', 'Floats and stands up just like a lighthouse and can be used either in the water or outdoors', 'Includes a cord that makes it a breeze to throw far, even for kids!\xa0']
reviews: [Bought this toy for dock diving practice. It floats, is brightly colored, durable, and nicely sized. This is not intended to be a chew toy! Its great for its intention - fetch in the water., I bought this Lighthouse for my new Newfoundland to retrieve in both fresh and saltwater. It is our favorite water toy! We have used this about 10 times this past summer and it's in perfect condition. The lighthouse floats upright in both salt and freshwater making it very easy for her to locate above the waves., I would give this toy 0 stars if it was an option for a variety of reasons. Its way to expensive to only last for five minutes before it broke. My Labradoodle loves to swim and retrieve anything I throw in the water for him. I thought this thing would float vertically but definitely did not in the saltwater. The third time I threw it for him the top of the lighthouse broke off from the weighted base and upon further inspection it looked as if the two were attached using low quality elmers glue. One would think at this price point you would be receiving a quality product, unfortunately that was not the case., Best water toy, well, other than tennis balls. My Standard Schnauzer loves swimming for this toy. What's really funny is that it was not tested in a salt water pool. The base needs to be slightly heavier. However, when it lays flat on the water it's easier for my dog to retrieve., Definitely a hit with our pup. The other dogs always steal it from him too! Easy to see because it pops right up out of the water. Highly recommended!, The light house dog toy fell apart after one use.I'm trying another one hope it works as it is a perfect toy for the water, this toy came apart within 15 minutes of play. seemed dry rotted., Our Portuguese Water Dog puppy LOVES this toy. The string came off right away, but the toy still works so well! She loves to carry it to the lake herself, and she will run in from shore or leap off the dock to retrieve it. It always pops up right away. Easy for us to spot, easy for her to see and grab. Just the right size for her (she's around 55 lbs)., My dog destroyed this in 10 min... too bad it was a super cute toy!, Used this out at the beach. My dog isn't a chewer of toys he retrieves. This one split in half under 30 tosses. Bummer, it floated so nice and was a good highly visible toy.]

title: Tuffy's Mega Tug Oval Squeaky Plush Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Tuffy's Mega Tug Oval Dog Toy is ideal for interactive play with one or multiple giant breed dogs. It’s made with three layers of safe, non-toxic fibers: soft fleece, industrial grade luggage material, and plastic coating. All three are fused and sewn together to make one ultra "tuff" layer, ensuring this toy is just as durable as it is fun. It also has a protective pouch around each of its squeakers as an added safety measure in the event your dog gets to the core. This toy is great for indoor use because of its soft exterior, perfect for outdoor use because it floats in water, and easy to clean because it’s machine washable.', "The Tuffy's Series Toys are designed to be play toys and not chew toys. Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. "]
key_benefits: ['Assembled with multiple seams and webbing to make this toy a worthy opponent for most moderate chewers.', 'Made with 3 uniquely fused layers for added durability during play.', 'Squeakers are sewn into a pouch for safe-keeping, allowing an extra layer of protection.', 'Floats in water for added fun and machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Ideal for large and giant breed dogs.']
reviews: [I have two large terriers and this toy is perfect for them to grasp when playing each other. Also, super tough material. Can't beat an aggressive chewer but definitely can hold its own., My dog, Bella, medium size (50lbs) chewed it up in about 15-20 minutes, was hoping it would stand up but did not last!, My puppies love all this toy. It’s still standing strong !!!!!, Toy was very tuff and just what they needed. They loved their present when they opened it., It’s the biggest tug toy I’ve ever seen but my dog loves it. It’s really durable!, This toy has really held up! I was worried about spending almost $25 for a toy, but the only thing our pooch has managed to do is stop the squeakers from squeaking. He hasn’t gotten through any of the fabric or seams yet and it’s been a month. Most toys we get him are destined to be destroyed in days, most of the hours or minutes. I am impressed!!, Dog enjoyed playing tug with it until she was left alone for a couple of minutes and chewed a hole in it and ripped out all the stuffing, not tough at all, destroyed in less than a week., Had the smaller version for my Shi Tzu and bought this for my friends Bull Mastiff who has just about chewed up everything else he had. He chews up wood. Anyway this product is very durable and tuff and well made. So far so good, has not destroyed it., They usually love to play tug of war but they didn’t like this one at all. It’s really hard for them to grab it not worth getting., My Charlie can chew through any toy in a matter of minutes.. this toy we've had for over a month.. the squeaker is pretty pathetic sounding now but he's only torn through one seam and the toy is still mostly intact. Definitely a great buy for us.. to be fair, Charlie seems to revere this toy more than others and enjoys trotting around with it in his mouth and shaking it more than chewing on it. We've played tug of war many times with him and it has held up well!]

title: Fetch Pet Products RopeBots Yellow Squeaky Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Get ready to party with Fetch Pet Products RopeBots Yellow Dog Toy.  Love rope? Love squeakers? This toy has it all! With a tightly woven, reinforced canvas exterior, and a soft, squeaky interior, this toy is sure to keep Fido engaged and happy! A unique, double-stitched canvas encases the squeakers, creating a unique texture for curious pup. Plus, this pawsome toy is tested thoroughly to ensure quality and safety for those moderate chewers and tuggers—aggressive chewers, this one may not be for you! Interactive play can help end boredom and strengthen the unbreakable bond between you and your dog, so what are you waiting for? reviews: [really cute but my 7 1/2 month old golden doodle destroyed it in 5 minutes. misleading description states for moderate chewers, I like the grunt squeaker in the body. I love the heart!, its cute but smaller than i expected and the rope is just sewn to the fabric. might have been tougher if the rope pieces were connected to each other., My puppy loves to chew and play with this toy. It seems flimsy but is holding up to a lot of tugging play and chewing. Easy for puppy to carry]

descriptions:

reviews: [I owen Huskey's and German Shepherds they really enjoy this toy. I love it because they stopped biting on the tables and they are also beneficial for My Dogs., Both my pitbulls love chewing on the elk antler rope toys. I don't recommend this medium size one as much as the larger loop. The Elk antlers are very durable and they last forever. But unfortunately the rope is not as durable as the antler so the rope was shredded. I like that I don't have to closely supervise them while chewing on Elk Antlers, because I don't have to worry about pieces breaking off. Even powerful pit bull jaws aren't able to crack these antlers, so it promotes consistent gnawing to whittle them down. Also I like that they are a natural source of essential minerals and don't cause digestive issues! However if your dog likes to shred rope toys i recommend the larger loop as I]

descriptions:
['Get the good times rolling with the Ethical Pet Pup Treads & Rope Dog Toy. This cute combo toy features a durable rubber tire attached to a rope for some rollicking rolling, chewing and tug of war games with your fuzzy sweetie.  Raised treads on the tire and the attached textured Dental Ropes massage teeth and gums for a healthy mouth and extra satisfying chewing. There’s even a hollow inside where you can hide treats or peanut butter for added fun!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Ethical Pet
']
key_benefits: ['Combo toy features a rubber tire toy attached to a rope for great tug of war play.', 'Durable rubber and woven rope encourage healthy chewing behaviors.', 'Raised treads on the tire and their trademark braided Dental Ropes help massage teeth and gums for oral health.', 'Ships in assorted fun colors chosen at random.', 'Comes in three sizes to accommodate a variety or dogs.']
reviews: [Broken in three tug o wars within the first ten minutes of playing with the dog. The rope slipped right through the hole. Then a couple hours later the tire was shredded by my 50lb dog. Boo, My one yr old German Shepard tore this tire to shreds within the first 5 minutes of me giving it to him. I would not recommend to dog parents of super chewers.]

title: Nerf Dog Trackshot Arrowhead Launcher Dog Toy, 14-in
descriptions:
['Get your best buddy moving with the Nerf Dog Trackshot Arrowhead Launcher Dog Toy. This 14-inch interactive toy features a plush, brightly colored arrow-shaped body and with a rope at one end for a secure grip, whether it’s in your hands or his teeth. He’ll get maximum exercise from chasing it up to 75 feet away when you attach the flickable launcher to your thumb and let it sail through the air. When he’s given it his best shot and the game’s over, simply throw it in the dishwasher for no-fuss cleanup.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Nerf Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Arrow-shaped launcher toy for dogs.', 'Encourages human-to-pooch interaction.', 'Designed to withstand hours of rough play.', 'Lightweight and portable.', 'Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.']

title: Frisco Holiday Christmas Light Rope with TPR Squeaky Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Light up your smaller dog’s life with this combination toy! This toy has the best of a biteable TPR toy and a classic, cotton rope toy, so your dog can play any way they want. The TPR lightbulb has a built-in squeaker they’ll never get enough of and the rope toy is great to bite and hold onto. Put one in your little pup’s stocking this year!', '
                This toy is not recommended for heavy chewers. No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

']
key_benefits: ['Cotton rope and TPR toy design is great for interactive games with your dog.', 'TPR lightbulb toy has a built-in squeaker to keep your dog’s attention.', 'Features a cotton rope loop attached to the TPR toy that’s great for biting and grabbing onto.', 'Sized perfectly for small to medium-size dogs to have a little fun.', 'Makes a great stocking stuffer for the little pupper in your fur family.']

title: KONG Holiday AirDog Stick Dog Toy, Large
descriptions:
['No gift this season could be more fetching for your pooch than the KONG Holiday AirDog Stick Dog Toy. With the bouncy consistency of a tennis ball, a shape like a stick and a cheery squeaker inside, it’s basically all of your furry friend’s dreams come true in one amazing object. Its festive candy-cane coloring means you and your chum are less likely to lose it during a vigorous session of playing fetch. And its non-abrasive exterior material is gentler on his teeth than a conventional tennis ball. So, go get it — you and your canine companion could probably both stand to burn off some extra holiday energy.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ['Has the chewy consistency of a tennis ball.', 'Contains a delightful squeaker that rewards chewing.', 'Shaped like a stick for great games of fetch.', 'Covered in non-abrasive material that’s gentle on teeth.', 'Great for indoor and outdoor play.']

title: PetSafe Grip 'N Tug Squeak Replacement Tug Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Give your squeak loving pup something fun to chew on with the PetSafe Grip 'N Tug Squeak Replacement Tug Dog Toy. Made to be a great replacement for the PetSafe Grip ‘n Tug toy—or a great new addition to your pup's current toy collection—this tug toy not only squeaks, it is made from the same cotton and polyester blend material used to cover fire hoses! Designed for your medium- to tough-chewing pooch, PetSafe Grip 'N Tug Squeak Replacement Tug Dog Toy is great for canine companions known for their ruff and tough play.", '

                        See all items by PetSafe
']
key_benefits: ['Made from the same durable cotton and polyester blend used in covering fire hoses!', "Thickly padded pockets are designed to contain and paw-tect the 2 self-sealing squeakers during your pup's intense play.", '20 inches of fun inducing chew and tug play.', "It can be used by itself or as a paw-fect replacement for the Grip 'n Tug toy.", "Designed to satisfy your pup's squeaking needs."]

title: Wapiti Labs Chew 'n Tug Loop Dog Chew Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
["Wapiti Labs Chew 'n Tug Loop Dog Chew Toy contains a section of elk antler attached to a piece of 100% all-natural cotton rope looped around and knotted with one knot. Elk antlers provide great taste and health benefits for dogs. Wapiti Labs Antlers are premium grade North American antlers that are naturally shed from ranch-raised elk. Male elk regrow antlers every year, making this a completely renewable source, no animals are harmed. Antlers are power washed, air dried and sanded to remove sharp edges for safety - no bleaching. Remember to always supervise your pet while using antler treats.", 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Wapiti Labs
']
key_benefits: ['This enticing toy contains a section of elk antler attached to a piece of 100% all-natural cotton rope looped around and knotted with one knot', 'Contains a section of ranch-raised elk antler attached to a piece of 100% all-natural cotton rope with a knot on each end', 'Elk antler is a natural source of essential minerals such as Calcium, Glucosamine, Iron, and Potassium', 'Elk antler supports bone, joint and muscle health while aiding in kidney function and improved wound healing', 'Each toy measures about 14 to 16 inches long and the rope is 100% American recycled cotton']
reviews: [Perfect for tug or chewing. Keeps puppy busy. Only thing to watch is the ends of the rope shred easily, so it's not a toy I can leave alone with my puppy., My American Staffordshire Terrior loves this toy however, since he is a bullly breed, the antler part only lasted a day. All gone after just an afternoon of intermittent chewing. We still have the rope part and it is showing wear rapidly. For a breed with less bite it probably would last much longer. Still a great toy but pricy for a heavy chewer., Got this for our Pitty. Read reviews with other Pit owners and they loved it. I liked it, but he chewed the rope apart way too easily. I think I will just get him antler chews and forgo the rope. plus I'll get more antler for my buck!, Both my pitbull have their own & love them so much. By far their favorite rope chew toy. The Elk antlers are very durable and they last forever. I have a feeling the rope would have been destroyed a long time ago if the antler wasn't so appealing and time consuming. I like that I don't have to closely supervise them while chewing on these, because I don't have to worry about pieces breaking off. Even powerful pit bull jaws aren't able to crack these antlers, so it promotes consistent gnawing to whittle them down. Worth every penny because they last a very long time. Also I like that they are a natural source of essential minerals and don't cause digestive issues!, I have a 7-month old German shepherd puppy and we go through toys like they're nothing. I bought this toy because he has another rope/bone combo which he LOVES, and this one is no different. He keeps himself entertained by tossing the rope around and then running to catch it. The antler keeps his mouth busy for hours and he never gets bored with it. I highly recommend this!]

title: KONG Puppy Goodie Bone with Rope Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
['The KONG Puppy Goodie Bone is designed to entertain puppies with plenty of energy to burn. Fill the patented Goodie Grippers with Puppy Snacks, then watch the fun begin as your puppy tries to reach the reward. The attached rope provides an additional texture to chew on and is great for a game of tug-o-war, keeping your active puppy both happy and busy.', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ['Perfect for use with KONG Puppy Easy Treat, Puppy Snacks or Puppy Ziggies', 'Designed to entertain puppies with plenty of energy to burn', 'The attached rope provides an additional texture to chew on and is great for a game of tug-o-war, keeping your active puppy both happy and busy', 'Soft puppy rubber formula great for soothing gums', 'Perfect for use with dogs up to nine months of age']
reviews: [I'm sure that this is a perfectly good chew toy for an extra small puppy or a rambunctious cat, but not for the 30 lb Husky it was meant for. After receiving the comically small toy I went back on Chewy to see if I missed something. The "read more" description does say that the toy is for extra small dogs, but maybe to save on future returns from pet owners, Chewy could change the main description to "Kong Puppy Goodie Bone Extra Small", or have a size option when ordering the toy. I think that would help with a lot of the confusion/upset pet owners, especially since Kong does make other sizes of this chew toy., I did not see any reference to the size of this toy in the product description. I assumed it was much bigger. The size on this toy extra small. It is rated for a puppy up to 4lbs. My puppy is 50lbs. I wish it came in a larger size as he loves to play tug. Also, Chewy sent me two although my order says I only ordered one. I'll be sending both back., I purchased this toy for my 7 month old Chizer pup. In less than an hour she had chewed it apart. Normally I’m very happy with Kong products but this toy not so much., Cute but this toy is super super small. Probably too small for my large breed puppy. I also didn’t realize it won’t come in the color I ordered it. I was really looking forward to some cute pink toys for my girl but ended up with blue., It looked much bigger than it was. We ordered it because our dog ate one of her toys and had to have surgery. We thought this would be a safe toy but it is small enough for her to swallow whole., It’s my fault that I didn’t look at reviews or the size in the description, but this definitely needs to be labeled as XS in the title. Guess I will donate it., So tiny, even my small breed pup chewed it to bits in minutes. Waste of my money! Maybe for a pet who isn't as into chewing!, Perfect size for a petite puppy. My puppy loves the rope part and has untangled one side but at 3 months it’s still a great toy for him. I also love that the bone part is adjustable to move higher and make a tug of war rope. I ended up with a blue one and I know reviews said they were upset getting pink with a boy dog. Not sure if filling out the pet profile has anything to do with it ??, Came untied immediately and the bone is separated from the rope now but the puppies still love it! (I have 9 right now.), I was expecting this toy to be much bigger in size!, and out of safety reasons I can't let my ACD puppy play with it. Very disappointing, I wish that the advertisement was more clear on the products dimensions before I purchased. However on the positive side, the material seems to be top quality. The rubber bone is sturdy and wouldn't be too harsh for a weak jaw/teeth. This would work really well for a growing puppy.]

title: KONG Winders Tails Dog Toy, Alligator, Color Varies
descriptions:
['The KONG Winders Tails Dog Toy provides over three feet of fun and is designed for interactive play with your pup. Dogs love to toss, fetch and tug this exciting toy, which comes in four adorable animal characters including hedgehog, alligator, fox and otter. The coiled body cleans and polishes your dog’s teeth and the squeaker and tails help to entice play.', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ['Designed for interactive play, dogs love to toss, fetch and tug these exciting toys', 'Squeaker inside for added fun', 'Coiled body polishes and cleans teeth during play', 'Minimal stuffing for less mess around the house', 'Available in four fun characters so you can pick your favorite']
reviews: [My dogs love toys with squeakers so they just love this thing. I like that it doesn't have a lot a stuffing so it's less mess for me when they inevitablely destroy it. I've had it about 3 weeks now and it's still in great shape too! Very pleased with this purchase., My dog loves this toy but it was only a few hours before it ended up on my craft table for surgery. The head of the alligator(?) became unstitched and the fluff and the squeaker were removed. She even tried to jump up and take the toy off my table because she wanted to keep playing!, Six month old GSD loved this toy enough to tear a huge piece out of the center and swallow it right in front of me. Love the fact that Kong sews the squeakers securely into the toy, but fabric not strong enough for destructive chewers., My two pups love this toy. They typically destroy soft plush toys, but have not with this one. Kong lives up to its name!, Gave this to our 1 yr old Aussie & she had holes in it and the back chewed off pretty quick., My 2 Pitbulls and 1 Rat Terrier are TOUGH on toys! They love this one, but the first day we had it they had a tug-of-war with it and the rope tail separated immediately. They will play with both parts separately now. They all have a strong prey drive, so they shake it like crazy and chew the squeaker., If you are going to market this as a tug toy, it should be able to be used as such and last more then two hours. My 6 month old mastiff pup played tug with this toy twice before the rope part came off., Not a toy for a dog that likes to chew, my young lab chewed it apart in one day, This toy is so cute! It’s 3ft long , which my dog loves. My doodle loves it! We haven’t had it long, but it’s been durable so far!, Brought for American bulldog, he was able to destroy this tough chew toy within 3 hours. Poor quality]

descriptions:

The denim rope fibers clean dogs' teeth as they chew and play. Rope fibers floss dog's teeth as they chew and play. Safe, long lasting great for games, fetch and play. Built strong to chew and play for hours, perfect for teething puppies.", 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Mammoth
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% natural cotton', "Rope fibers floss dog's teeth", 'Built strong to chew and play for hours', 'Safe, long lasting great for games, fetch and play', 'Perfect item for teething puppies and strong chewers']
reviews: [Jack destroys rope toys in an hour or less. I bought this knowing it might last a day. I buy ropes for him to tear up, and natural rubber toys to last. He's had it more than a day and it isn't shredded. For those who complain it's a cheap toy, well it is, it's. $2 ppl. $2.00 for 24+ hrs of enjoyment is worth it. For rope size, Jack is knee-height and 50 lbs. Rope size is perfect. P.S. couldn't choose color, but it was white with red and black. Nice., Zoey loves this rope! She will run around and chew and throw it everywhere! It has held up amazing and truly doesn’t have much damage on it! Very surprised on how well it has held up to a strong chewer! Would definitely recommend and it is a good toy to throw to!, I purchased this for my 4 month old German Shepherd, Rott mix and it lasted for 1 month and he has torn this to shreds. I may try another after he gets though the puppy stage., Kind of silly, but I wish I could have picked the colors...not really sure why you can't. But, both my dogs love these toys., I have a Beagle/Blue Tick mix that is a very aggressive chewer. I have struggled to find a toy that last longer than a couple weeks. However, this toy has been phenomenal! It's been four months and this toy is still in one piece, not unraveled, with just a few busted areas. The toy has some weight to it, so it's definitely a toy I can't just fling around the house. Very happy with my purchase!, Goldendoodle approved! This is the most I’ve ever seen my Ellie play with a rope toy., Seems to be holding up great even tho my pitbull takes it everywhere with him., I have other rope knot toys that have lasted a long long time. This didn't., This toy is well made and attractive. It appears to be durable and well made, so it should be pretty good for intense chewers - for a while, not forever. My dog doesn't show a lot of interest in it yet, but I'm hoping he will warm up to it over time. He seems okay to put it in his mouth and kind of interact with it but it doesn't make him playful or sit for long periods to chew. I think a less picky dog who likes chewing and/or ropes would love it., My 12 pound Jack Russell mix loves her rope toys! However i would NOT recommend this particular one. It easily came apart within a few hours out of the box and left several small strands of rope all over that could be swallowed unknowingly and cause emergency health issues.]

title: Nylabone DuraToy Happy Moppy Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Entertain your dog with a Dura Toy from Nylabone. These exciting and colorful toys are made from premium fabrics with double stitching at stress points.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Nylabone
']
key_benefits: ["Keeps dogs entertained with a colorful and exciting toy. It'll quickly become a household favorite!", "Shake it, tug it, or toss it. The multiple textures are great for any type of play and an EZ-pickup ball means your pup can take this wherever they'd like.", 'Made from premium fabric and double stitched at stress points for extreme durability.', 'Helps your pup fight boredom and encourages appropriate chewing habits, saving shoes and furniture from destructive chewing.', 'Vet-recommended so you can feel confident about giving this toy to your pet.']
reviews: [My 5 month old husky corgi puppy LOVED this toy so much that he shredded it within a few hours. Awesome toy, just unfortunately could not withstand his needle teeth! This toy is definitely for lighter chewers or for maybe older dogs? He had a blast with it so I am not disappointed just wish it would’ve lasted longer for his sake., This is a great concept but it didn't last 5 minutes before busting open and spilling its filling all over the floor plus all of the individual sections came apart losing their stuffing in short order. I gave 2 stars because the dogs had a blast for the 5 minutes it lasted, one star is my first choice, totally not worth the cost. NOT a durable toy, should not have "DuraToy" in the name of the product., This isn’t the most durable toy, but my youngest pittie, Simon, absolutely adores it! He loves to shake it around as hard as he can. He seems to enjoy the different textures and the feel of the strips flapping through the air. It’s definitely a toy for supervised play, though... I agree with other reviewers that this product would be much improved by some sort of reinforced stitching in the top to keep the strips attached. Eventually Simon “deconstructs” it into separate strips, which he still enjoys playing with — he’ll pick up a single strip and shake it around by itself (he’s easily amused, LOL) — but I could see this becoming a possible choking hazard for some dogs. We always watch Simon, I thought this was a great toy. Yes it holds up well for puppies. No it doesn’t hold up for heavy players and chewers but when our two dogs got big I repurchased at least twice and owned the large and medium sizes. They pulled it apart and played tug a war with the strands. Yes they were all over the yard. Great for duel play. I recommend it whether it falls apart or not. One of my all time favorites and am buying again for new puppy., I purchased this for our new puppy- my older dog had the smaller one when she was a pup and it was well loved. This larger one is perfect for the 2 of them to play tug with together., My dogs love this. Now, we're talking two full grown pitties who destroy things (not as fast as some others, but still). They spent most of their time running around with this or chewing on it to entice the other to chase them for it. The pieces are not connected, they're just knotted together. I've reknotted mine twice now. Today, I'm going to sew all the strips together at the knot location (I recommend heavy duty upholstery thread, it's the only thing that holds up to my dogs). This toy would be 5 stars if it were sewn together at the top., This is a great toy keeps my dog busy, she is a chewer. only thing is you need to keep an eye on the toy can shred a bit and need to cut off some of the shreds especially in the rope part to keep dog from swallowing .. but she loves it, My dogs had this torn apart very quickly. There is nothing holding all of the separate strands together besides a loose knot., My Sharpei and Macaw both enjoy their Moppy Toy. Durable for Dog. Macaw cuddles and chews on his. Love how colorful It is. Bought 3 so far over the years., Our 13 week dobie mix loves this with the mix of sounds and textures (we tied it to the end of a pole and he loves chasing it). But it's worth noting the fabric pieces are only knotted together, not stitched or reinforced. Once he got the knot loose everything fell apart. Reordering because he likes it so much.]

Designed for durability with a recessed, protected squeaker, KONG Squeezz Ball with Handle is great for indoor and outdoor use.', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Designed for light/moderate chewing.', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ["Easy to squeak rope toy that's perfect for tossing, tugging and retrieving", 'Recessed, hidden squeakers that keep the squeak going even when punctured', 'Fun, erratic bounce keeps your dog engaged', 'Durable, non-toxic material', 'All Squeezz products are sold in assorted jewel tones and color ships at random (Ruby, Amethyst, Emerald and Sapphire)']
reviews: [This is a great toy to play and be interactive with your pet, not to leave your dog alone with it, that's why so many of you are complaining about them chewing through the handles. They only thing I wish the company would do is make different sized balls for different sized dogs. (Not all dogs are large breed and do well with a 3" ball). I think my dog likes the squeaky sound too., My dogs fav toy! Durable yet lightweight so I can toss it pretty far during fetch. Nice handle for me when playing tug of war., Our dog, Dayo, is very playful. He *loves* anything that squeaks, but he also likes to rip out the squeakers. (Then he gives us a tragic look that seems to say 'Why has it gone quiet?') This ball is perfect for him. He's managed to destroy the handle, but otherwise it's intact, still squeaks, and he loves it. The rope is robust as is the ball (which is where the squeaker is). He likes it so much he hasn't even tried to decimate it. This is high praise, I promise you., Waste of money. Very cheaply made and doesn’t last. The rope started fraying in 8 hours. I don’t recommend it., My 90lb GS loves this squeaky ball with rope. He play together and he picks it over anything else he has available to play with., This toy is fun to tug and throw. I knew eventually my dog would chew through the rope but she is still enjoying playing with the ball. It is her favorite ball., Good toy however be careful with the handle it is rubber and my dog was chewing on it and was ripping it apart. Had to cut that and rubber piece near the ball to make it safe., my dog loves this. great for fetching and tugging. he can use either end to play., This was destroyed in minutes. Very disappointed for a Kong toy. The rope ripped and was in two pieces, then the x pice came off and now we have a squeak toy and a pile of shredded thread. Don’t waste your money., Lasted 5 mins in our Great Danes mouth. Don't buy unless you hide it from them when not actively using it with them. Especially not for power chewers.]

title: ZippyPaws Monkey RopeTugz Plush & Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Tug of war just got a lot more playful with ZippyPaws Monkey RopeTugz Plush & Rope Dog Toy, featuring durable 2/3-inch thick rope — the same kind of tested rope used by mountain climbers. This extra-tough rope you can withstand hours of tugging and play. It is strong enough for any sized dog, including larger dogs.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by ZippyPaws
']
key_benefits: ['Fun tug-of-war toy.', 'Great for interactive play.', 'Long-lasting made from super durable 2/3-inch thick rope — the same kind of tested rope used by mountain climbers.', 'Fun squeak!', 'Stuffed monkey design with little numbs throughout to help with teeth and gums.']
reviews: [The first thing that happened was the squeeker broke. It was sad since he liked the squeek. It is a good tug toy., I love this toy as the ropes are soft to the touch so no rope burn. It is easy to throw and pull for this disabled gal and my C’Zar loves it too! And when can you honestly say your pup has a monkey on his back., A toy that lasts more than hours. This has lasted about a month in the past and expect this one to be the same. Great interactive toy and toy to play by itself., My adolescent boxer Nola LOVES this toy. Nothing I’ve found that’s not entirely made of rubber lasts long with her, though. It remained in tact for a day with the exception of the ears, which are always the first to go. After a couple days she’d managed to chew through the rope and yank out all the string inside. By one week she’d torn off the face and pulled out all the stuffing. It’s now a jumble of knotted string with some sections of monkey carcass in the middle. But it still has some loop of rope in tact at each end and she loves playing tug with it so we’re gonna try to milk it a bit longer. My sister’s dog has had this toy for months and it’s doing fine, so clearly it’s just not, We bought the initial tug of war monkey when we brought Joe home at 8 weeks. He took his time shredding the wrap on the handles and it lasted 4 months. With a big doodle that’s amazing. Just replaced it and he is so happy to have his monkey back. He dumps it on our lap all night asking for us to play. Strong, affordable and longlasting, I thought it would be a nice change to a tug toy but she had it apart and stuffing coming out in less then 30 minutes., Body of toy doesn't seem like it will stand up to very active dogs chewing or pulling on it., For tugging it's great but keep an eye on the toy as some areas don't hold up very well. We've had it almost a week and our lab puppy ripped the nose open and pulled out the stuffing., My pup really enjoys this toy. It s nice and long and makes it easy for him to be at one end and me at the other so we can play tug. very sturdy, This is the third time we're ordering this. It's fun for the dog, and is very strong and robust, and lasts a long time. Very well designed and built!]

title: Chuckit! Amphibious Fetch Dog Toy Kit
descriptions:
['Show your water-loving furry friend a good time with the Chuckit! Amphibious Fetch Dog Toy Kit. It includes an Amphibious Bumper, Zipflight and three-pack of Amphibious Balls to take with you and your pup on your next trip to the pool, beach or lake. The Bumper serves as an ideal toy for interactive play whether your paw-tner enjoys a game of fetch or tug-o-war. The Zipflight features an aerodynamic disc shape and is perfect for long-distance games of fetch along with the Amphibious Balls. All of these playthings feature durable canvas to withstand rough play and float so they will not get lost in the water. Get your companion active with the Chuckit! Amphibious Fetch Dog Toy Kit.', 'Chuckit! Amphibious Bumper Medium, Chuckit! Zipflight Medium, Chuckit! Amphibious Balls (3) pack.', '

', '

                        See all items by Chuckit!
']
key_benefits: ['Amphibious toy kit that features multiple playthings designed for water-loving pups.', 'Includes an Amphibious Bumper, Zipflight and 3-pack of Amphibious Balls to take to the pool, beach or lake.', 'Bumper is ideal for interactive play whether your paw-tner enjoys a game of fetch or tug-o-war.', 'Zipflight and Amphibious Balls are perfect for long-distance games of fetch with your furry friend.', 'All of the toys are made of durable canvas to withstand rough play and float so they will not get lost in water.']

title: DuraForce 3 Way Tug Squeaky Dog Toy, Blue
descriptions:
['Keep your pup on her toes with DuraForce’s 3 Way Tug Dog Toy! This soft, yet durable toy is specially designed to stand up to paw-lenty of play with multiple layers of material that’s secured with multiple rows of stitching, including a cross-stitch on top. Your hound is going to go head over tail when she discovers that there are squeakers inside, and you’ll love knowing that they are sewn into pockets for your sidekick’s safety! Toss the toy in your backyard, at the park or in the lake, pool or ocean—yup, it floats too! Once your paw-tner’s play session is all done, simply put it in the washing machine, let it air dry and let the fun continue!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by DuraForce
']
key_benefits: ['Soft on the outside but built multiple layers of material and several rows of stitching for reinforcement.', 'Paw-fect for a game of tug-o-war or fetch.', 'Floats, so it’s great for a day at the pool, lake or beach!', 'Contains squeakers that are sewn into pockets for your pup’s safety.', 'Machine washable for hassle-free cleaning (air dry only).']
reviews: [I was very disappointed by this toy. While my dog LOVES playing with it because of the squeakers and it gives her lots of room to grab when playing tug of war, I would not recommend this toy for a medium or large sized dog that you would call a 'tough chewer'. The toy had a hole in it within the first 10 minutes out of the package during a fetch and tug of war game- the seam popped and the white inside was popping out. Considering the cost and the 'for tough chewers' label, I would have expected this toy to be more durable., One tug session, didn’t last long. Disappointed thought we had a winner here. Not even a full day old., Great toy for my pitbull and I to play tug of war with. She loves it! It's very durable & stands up to the tugging, however I would not give it to her unless we are playing, she would definitely destroy it., We have a rowdy house. This is the top tug-o-war toy as far as durability. No, we don’t let it lay around the house: otherwise, they would slowly destroy it like any other plush toy. It’s tug o war time and then it gets put away. many tug of war toys have been tested by us and this one has really earned its place so much that we got a second as backup.]

title: ZippyPaws Bunny Jigglerz Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your pup will have a hoppin’ good time with the ZippyPaws Bunny Jigglerz Dog Toy. This fun bunny features a noisemaker that squeaks when you shake him.  Crinkle material in the head and tail keeps pups playing and engaged. Made of strong Cordura material with added cross-stitching, this bite-resistant toy can handle even the ruff-est play. Stuffing-free design means it stays mess-free even if pup chomps start to tear its tough outer shell.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by ZippyPaws
']
key_benefits: ['Great for dogs of all sizes—even rough players.', 'Special squeak mechanism squeaks when dogs shake it.', 'Made of thick Cordura with reinforced cross stitching for extra durability.', 'Bunny has a crinkly head and tail for added fun.', 'Just the right size for carrying and shaking.']
reviews: [This is a great toy that my dog has had in the past but unfortunately this toy came already ripped., This was my Scottish Terrier Girl's Easter gift. She loves the loud squeakers and finds it very shakeable (very important in a toy). The toy has survived for 2 days with minimum shredding and no squeaker puncture. Hopeful. Nothing stands up to a Scottie for long., This toy is well made and works well for a game of tug. My dog also likes to shake it and activate the squeakers. The toy squeaks by both pressing on a squeak box or shaking the toy. She also likes the crinkle sound when she chews on the ends of the toy. I'll likely buy another when this one wears out., It’s like one of those large plastic speak toys for police dogs but wrapped in a fluffy rabbit costume. My 55 lb mutt loves it. Great buy!, This bunny is not only cute, but both our dogs love it! We have a Vizsla and a Bulldog, both extreme chewers, and so far it has held up. It has only been 3 days, but no signs of wear - often toys lasts minutes, this one has lasted days and I expect it to last a lot longer., My German shepherd and Anatolian shepherd mix love these plus do not destroy in an hour., My dog and my brothers dogs love them. Both dogs are really tough on toys but this one holds up to rough chewing (sheds a lot though). Can’t wait til the squeaker dies., Great for large destructive dogs who like stuffed toys, My dog loves all the squeakers and it’s holding up beautifully]

title: Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2 with Fleece Lure Dog Toy
descriptions:
['If you’re looking for an easy way to keep your dog happy and active, look no further than the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2 Lure Dog Toy. A busy schedule doesn’t allow much time for walking your dog every night, but this interactive toy will help your pup exercise and bond with you right in your own yard. The lightweight pole has a soft, non-slip grip and wrist strap for easy handling, and the lure appeals to your pup’s natural instincts to catch by sprinting, changing direction and jumping. Designed with an innovative bungee cord, this is the only toy that prevents whiplash when the lure is caught.', 'The difference between the two Flirt Pole sizes relates to the size of your play area. We recommend a minimum unobstructed space of 15-feet by 15-feet to use the Regular Size Flirt Pole. The Jr Size Flirt Pole is much easier to use in play areas smaller than that.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off. Causing any dog to jump can be hazardous, especially dogs under one year of age, whose bones are still growing, and dogs who have joint and/or hip problems.', 'You can purchase replacement Squishy Face Studio Fleece Lures for continued fun and playtime!', '

                        See all items by Squishy Face Studio
']
key_benefits: ['The perfect toy to keep your pup active and prevent destructive behaviors caused by inactivity and boredom.', 'If you have obesity and health concerns, ensure your pup gets his exercise with this fun and interactive toy.', 'This lightweight toy weighs less than one pound and has a soft, non-slip grip and wrist strap for easy handling.', 'Lures are easy to change and don’t have any fasteners that can injure your dog’s mouth. Available for purchase in squeaker or non-squeaker option. Included with Flirt Pole V2.', 'Made in the USA using components tested for durability, strength and safety.']
reviews: [My chihuahua terrier mix is high energy and has a strong prey drive. (In one weekend she killed a beetle, a frog, and a baby bird.. I know...it was gross!) We were struggling with destructive behaviors and walking wasn’t enough to keep her busy or calm. Then our trainer showed us how much she loves to play flirt pole. This is a great training tool! She is so motivated to play she will actually follow commands to go to her mat and down and then wait for the get it command so that she can chase the lure. This is a wonderful way to channel her energy while giving us a bit of a break since she has to work harder than us during this type of play., Does your dog like to chase? Then look no further! My Doberman loves chasing bugs and trying to stomp on them with his big paws. Well, I’ve searched the internet for the perfect toy for him and I stumbled upon this. He LOVES it. He hasn’t quite gotten the idea that you are supposed to catch the end and actually grabs the bungee and I have to say I am so impressed. It is SO durable. This dog is able to scissor his way through a rope toy in minutes, but not with this bungee cord! Highly highly recommend this toy. I even considered getting a second one as a backup for when this eventually gets worn out/breaks., I have a high prey drive breed and this is such an awesome item! Sturdy for 10lbs, 25lbs, and probably up to 45/50lbs, if they aren’t reckless thrashers. Very comfortable to hold for medium sized women’s hands, and the tension and bounce of the cord are great. Very happy with this item and the price fits my limited budget. More extensions and different colors would be my only additional change but otherwise I love this so much. Awesome enriching toy to facilitate that prey drive in a lot of dogs, and even cats, if you’re tired of replacing the cheap plastic flirt toys., It’s basically a cat toy but for dogs! I highly recommend reading the directions carefully before introducing this item to your dog. Exercising before use is extremely important! But other than that it’s a fun interactive toy for the humans and doggos. My 9 year old pitbull, loves it., When our dog trainer recommended this, I thought she was nuts. It seems like an oversized cat toy. But we have an extremely active and large yellow lab 10-month-old puppy that never gets tired of playing with this. and it doesn’t require a lot of work on our part!, My shiba inu loves to play chase so I bought this for her. It's a silly toy, but it is good if you pup loves to hop or jump! Only thing is that I thought the pole was a little shorter and it is not retractable, so it is not recommended so indoor use. Although, I use it indoors just carefully so I don't accidentally wack something off a shelf. I look kind of ridiculous carrying this thing to the park but she loves it!, Recommend by our trainer as a good toy for tug play, my pit mix is terrified of the humongous stick. I honestly don’t see why it needs to be to huge and unwieldy - it’s like a cat toy for lions!, My puppy loves this! We can’t go on walks yet because he needs one more round of shots. Our yard is small so I needed a way to get him exercise. It tires him out and he never gets tired OF it., My German Shepard loves being able yo chase and run in circles for this it’s especially good yo work with my fog since I can’t walk he a lot cause of my injury but I still can stand and have he run around for this toy which is awesome to tire her out, My dog was just not interested in it at all, and since I had to unwrap it to find that out I couldn't return it. I wish I had tried a cheaper first. I really like the idea of this, and the construction, but it's no use if your dog just isn't interested (and he does enjoy chasing generally, this just didn't do it for him)]

title: Squishy Face Studio Fleece Lure Replacement Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Keep the fun going with the Squishy Face Studio Fleece Lure Dog Toy. Your dog is going to love the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2 so much that you’re going to need to replace the lure occasionally. Made from soft braided fleece, this toy is much safer than rope toys since there are no loose threads–and as an added benefit, this toy cleans your dog’s teeth while he chews. Just as fun off the pole, this lure can also be thrown for a fun game of fetch. When this toy is dirty, just throw it in the wash and it’s ready to be played with again!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', 'Use the Squishy Face Lure Replacement with the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2.', '

                        See all items by Squishy Face Studio
']
key_benefits: ["Made with soft fleece which helps to clean your dog's teeth while he plays and chews.", 'Designed with a loop at one end, a 4-strand braided mid-section and large tassels that will attract your dog. .', 'This toy is perfect to attach to the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2 or throw for a game of fetch.', 'Made from soft braided fleece so it’s safer than rope toys which can fray and choke your dog.', 'Easy to care for, this lure can be thrown in the washing machine after a dirty day of play.']
reviews: [Our year old boxer is obsessed with her flirt pole! I tried making home made replacement lures but she wasnt as crazy about them! Chewy had them to our door within a week!, Perfect attachment for his squishy face. Durable and he loves the fleece texture., This is the perfect replacement lure for the squishy face flirt pole. Using the flirt pole with lure is an excellent way to quickly exercise and tire your high drive dog., Great toy for the price. I need to replace these every week or two, but that is to be expected., This is a replacement for our squishy face toy. Let me tell you, I have two large dog's, brother and sister and they LOVE CHASING THIS!!!!!!!, My goldens like lure so we are hoping these will be stronger and better than things we have, I am about to purchase my second flirt pole for my 2 year old heeler mix. This has been absolutely her favorite thing to play with and I use it to keep up with her “drop it” and “sit” and “stay” commands. She will do anything for a few more minutes with the flirt pole!, I made a flirt stick and put this toy on the end. It’s holds up to working dogs! I’ve had it for 5 months now and it’s still held together!, Great way to combine fun and exercise that you both will enjoy. My dog is tough on chew toys so I don't expect these to last too long, but easy to replace. To make the product even better, like to see a quick release so lures can be changed out even faster., Love the lure pole...so much that we needed a replacement toy!]

title: Pets First NCAA Football Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Get your furry friend ready for gameday with the Pets First NCAA Football Rope Dog Toy. Officially licensed by the NCAA, this faux football is made of durable nylon and features an embroidered team logo. It’s designed with colored rope on either side to provide pet parents with a better grip during tug-o-war and also has a squeaker on the inside to keep your pup interested. Show off your team spirit and give your paw-tner a fun fetch or tug plaything with the Pets First NCAA Football Rope Dog Toy.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Pets First
']
key_benefits: ['Officially licensed by the NCAA.', 'Embroidered with your paw-tner’s favorite team’s logo.', 'Made of heavy-duty nylon for added durability.', 'Filled with plush polyester that’s great for snuggling.', 'Squeaker on the inside to keep your furry friend interested.']
reviews: [My new human mom hit me this play toy but in a weeks time I demolished it. You see, as soon as I got it I didn’t want any other toy & yes I slept with it too. My human mom introduced me to other toys but no I loved this one. Now I have to play with another toy that is not as special. I been good with the other toys but I am still hoping my human mom gets me another in her pay day., I love this toy because I’m a huge college football fan and my dog absolutely loves it as well. Granted, she’s a 20lb toy poodle so her teeth and bite are not very strong, so I can’t speak on durability. But we’ve had it for a while and she plays with it every day and it’s still in good condition. Loved this toy so much I bought my dad’s dog one, Disappointed in this order. The seem broke the first day and the stuffing is now falling out., My 7 mo. old puppy (mini golden) tore this toy up in 2 days. Did not last long for him., I loved the look, but my 5 month old Dalmatian tore it to pieces in under 2 hours. It will not hold up to rough play., Looks great and I was super excited for it. The plush ball part gets torn up extremely easy., I have a 5 year old boxer and 1 year old frenchie.... this thing lasted forever!!! its their favorite toy to play with together which makes for the perfect toy in any dog home, We have two dogs who love to tug-a-war on anything long enough for them both to grab and this toy they love to pull and run side by side. The football lasted less than 3 minutes., My dog destroyed this as soon as it came out of box. Very thin material. He usually doesn’t tear up toys but as soon as he bit into ball it punctured it and stuffing came out. Wish I had read the negative reviews before purchasing., Bought this as a Christmas gift for my dog who is very gentle with her toys. She likes to hear the squeaky song so she bites down just enough to make the sound. Ball started falling apart and making a mess almost immediately. Super poorly made. Junk in a day or two. Save your money. Completely disappointed.]

This toy also sports your sidekick’s favorite team’s name, logo and colors, so everyone he plays with will know who he’s rooting for. key_benefits: ['Officially licensed by the NCAA.', 'Made of durable nylon webbing and packed with soft poly-fill that’s great for cuddling.', 'Features a squeaker inside to get pup extra excited to play!', 'Designed with a team logo that’s woven over screened football field graphics.', 'Makes the perfect gift for sports fans with pets so they can be all geared up for the park, game or tail-gate paw-ty.']
reviews: [Can’t give a definite rating because I just opened the package & haven’t given it to my pup. Only problem I have is I ordered the Alabama toy & received Penn State. Since my puppy is just going to chew it up, I don’t guess that doesn’t matter too much., My year-old lab puppy loved this from minute one, and it lasted about a week before she ripped off the logo, then the stitching, then spread the stuffing all over the house. Frankly, a week is pretty good for a stuffed toy around here! She still loves using it for tug of war, even though it's in tatters, and it's nice and easy for humans to hold, too., My American Bulldog loves this toy & it is very sturdy. We play tug-o-war with it frequently & she also loves chewing on the squeaker area when we’re not playing together., I have two, four month old, dachshund puppies. They love the toy and like to play tug of war with each other but thy were able to almost completely remove the fabric with the OSU logo the first day. The rest of the toy seems pretty durable., My Bulldog puppy loved it immediately, as she found the squeaker right away! Great grip for tug o war. Unfortunately it didn't take her long to find a weak point to open it on one side, but it's still strong enough to play with and I will buy it again., This toy is super cute . It's Huge. I have a big dog though 100 lbs. We are LSU fans so purchased that one for our German Shepherd . It's made pretty good . Hasn't had time to play with it yet but seems to be made alright. I would not recommend it for destructive chewers though. However just regular chewing is ok, Great for the first 20 min. She still plays with it. Just need to be careful of the stuffing. Fortunately our dog doesn’t eat it, just leaves it all over the floor., Such a cute toy for football fans. My dog has been playing with it non-stop!!!, This toy lasted my dogs 2 years before it finally came apart. Only one dog really played with it, and she always brought it to the humans to tug with., Love this toy especially since it for Alabama Roll Tide. But Bao has pulled it apart now.]

title: Mammoth Cottonblend 3 Knot Dog Rope Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
["Mammoth rope toys are made from premium materials in fun shapes for dogs of all sizes. Rope fibers floss dog's teeth as they chew and play. Rope fibers floss dog's teeth as they chew and play. Safe, long lasting great for games, fetch and play. Built strong to chew and play for hours, perfect for teething puppies.", 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

key_benefits: ['Made from 100% natural cotton', "Rope fibers floss dog's teeth", 'Built strong to chew and play for hours', 'Safe, long lasting great for games, fetch and play', 'Perfect item for teething puppies and strong chewers']
reviews: [I was excited to get our pup a rope that I thought would also stand up to her chompers. She isn't a super strong chewer, but can get through a puppy kong in a few weeks. She had multiple places where she chewed the knots apart on this in less than 20 minutes. We took it away and will only use it for tug now so we can keep an eye on the strings. Don't want her ingesting those!, We have an 18 week old puppy with needle sharp teeth who LOVES playing tug-of-war with things she's not supposed to. I figured this would be a good alternative to swap out for when she grabs things she's not supposed to. The second I took it out of the box it has moved up in rank to one of her favorite toys. She enjoys tossing and shaking it on her own as well as trying to yank it out of our hands. So far it's proven durable for rough play with a 15 lb. puppy. Will update if anything drastically changes., My 3 month old italian greyhound loves chewing on this toy. Before i got this he was chewing everything in the house, furniture, shoes, etc. Now he just chews on this!, Came apart at first use. Knots and strings do not hold. I always avoid anything made in China or India and this was made in Mexico so I was sort of excited it would be better. I’m also returning the snakebite her toy, though we didn’t use it at all, but it was also made in Mexico and I figured it wouldn’t be quality. I had a very difficult time returning it as it didn’t work on the website and the two numbers I was finally able to dig out, it almost seemed like they were hidden, kept being returned. When I finally called and got a representative, I did have the right website address but for whatever reason it didn’t work. It was pretty frustrating, I just wanted to get it over and out of my, I originally bought this for my larger older dog but my 9 week old puppy absolutely loves it - she is a chewer. I am a bit worried about the ends but so far so good., This is one of the best toys I have purchased so far. We have endless fun with this product. Tough,durable and heavy perfect for my German Shepherd., I have had ropes that fell apart really easily. They might all look the same but there is a quality difference and this one is a good one especially for the price., These ropes are my dogs favorite tug toy. Tough yet soft on my senior dogs mouth and the rope doesn’t fall apart., I can only speak for my dog. He weighs 25 lbs and is a cocker mix. He is also a shredder and had this thing completely unknotted and shredded apart within 2 hours. If you have a puller or a player I am sure it is great. I don't. He likes to rip things apart. Do not get this if your dog destroys plush toys as a goal., Both of my dogs enjoy playing with this toy and they get the added benefit of flossing!]

title: Frisco Rope with Double Loop Dog Toy
