Ideal for small and medium dogs.']
reviews: [I just received this yesterday, this morning my happy pup brought it over to my husband to play. He picked it up and the first loop came apart. Chief (my dog) had the other side he let go for a second and the other loop came out. The rest unraveled and now its just a peice of rope. So I guess i will be looking for a new one. :(, My 20 lb chihuahua mix ripped this toy into pieces within the first 30 minutes of having it. She has had other rope toys before that have stayed in better condition way longer. Would not recommend for anything but fetch., We've bought similar items from different places in the past but they were way too rigid, the boys didn't like them. But this fits the bill. Our little fighter loves it and our chewer does too., I didn't expect it to last as I have 2 pitties weighing close to 100 lbs but boy did they have fun with it. It lasted a lot longer than I thought it would. Nice toy., Within 20 minutes of us opening the box, it feel apart when our 3 month old lab pup was playing with it. Requesting replacement/refund., My Beagle Tore it apart in a day. He loves ropes and I thought this would last long cause of the thickness but he managed to rare it apart in one day and had to throw it away cause he tends to eat what he chews off, He loves it, and it seems pretty tough, although my dog is not very hard on his tug toys. It shipped quickly and arrived in good time. Happy with the purchase., I got this less than 12 hours ago. My dogs have already destroyed it. It’s poorly made. Will not buy again., I have a boxer mix with powerful jaws. Just can't seem to find a toy he cannot destroy. I'm sure this toy would be fine for normal dogs. However, my dog ripped it apart in no time., My pet at first did not want to play with this tug of war. while it looks sturdy, my 45 lb Samoyed was able to break this within a week of actually playing with me with it.]

title: Frisco Rope Multipack for Small to Medium Dog Toys, 4-count
descriptions:
['Let the games begin with these knotty, twisty, brightly colored fetch toys. This play-ready set has everything pups want to get in on the fun, including twisted ropes and even a rope ball! They’re built from a cotton/poly fiber blend that’s perfect for everyday play, at home or at the park. The rope texture is also great for teething pups.', '
                This toy is not recommended for heavy chewers. No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Frisco
']
key_benefits: ['Assorted rope toy set provides the playtime variety dogs love.', 'Set includes 4 toys, including knotted ropes and a rope ball perfect for fetch.', 'Provides daily play and exercise to help keep your pup healthy.', 'Rope texture is also great for teething puppies during light, supervised play.', 'Perfectly sized for small to medium dog breeds.']
reviews: [While the price point is quite good, these toys are weak! If that dog in the photo really got going on these, they would be rags. My 4 month old lab/retreiver/pit mutt puppy ends up with a mouth full of soft, swallowable string/yarn whenever we play with the tug toy. And he's not even going that hard. The ball is...a ball. Hardier, but a little too hard, weirdly enough. A pretty selection, but we need tougher stuff., So my dog is a 6 month old Boykin Spaniel. Unlike many of his breed, he doesn’t destroy toys (destroykins). And he had 2 other ropes toys but one was for when he was 8 weeks old, and it’s just too small, and the other got left outside and was just gross, so I decided I’d get these, as always has the Chewy low price for the quantity you’d get. Well we’ve had them for 2 weeks probably. The ones with balls on them are great. But the ones with tassels hanging, are a problem. Like I said he doesn’t destroy toys, but it’s almost like the tassels are either not good quality yarn, and it’s like they tassels aren’t “connected” to the rest of the rope, what I mean is, a slight tug and they just break off, When we got our puppy we ordered one of every type of dog toy not knowing what he’d like and these were the perfect size. Great for small to medium sized dogs. For the price I wasn’t expecting anything special but these have been amazing., This little assortment of ropes has proved a good buy...they weren't quite as big as i thought from the description, but that was probably on me...they have worked out well, though, as the dogs like to change from one to the other. So not too bad for the money. And so far they stand up to their abuse., I have a Small dog only one!! The Rope toys fell apart really quick! They are all in the trash!! Will not purchase again!!!, My dog likes to play with ropes. But he chews through one of these in about 24 hours. Your mileage may vary., Dog loves these. He eventually shreds them all over the house. Which is ok as he leaves our stuff alone., No dogs had a great time with lease but they didn't last long. I think it was worth it for the price. Just expect threads around the house, Our puppy loves these chew toys and we use them for tug of war. Good size for our 15 # puppy, This is ONE of MANY toys that we've bought for our little MAN from Chewy.com. We continue to shop Chewy.. Web--site is EASY to navigate - Orders receive within DAYS.... ALL the toys we've purchased have been GOOD QUALITY]

title: Frisco Plush and Rope Bundle Dog Toy, 6-Pack
descriptions:
['Pups everywhere go wild for playtime, so let them have even more fun with a menagerie of toys, specially selected just for them.  This bundle pack comes with 6 toys to unleash your pup’s play potential—a plush bungee giraffe, plush squeaky monkey, plush bone, twisty rope toys and a squeaky plush ball. It’s everything your pup needs to get playtime started, from textures that grab their attention to sounds that keep them in the game, and soft materials that are perfect for cuddling too. Take the guesswork out of spending quality time together with this play-ready assortment of toys, so you can keep your dog happily active and wagging!', '
                This toy is not recommended for heavy chewers. No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Frisco
']
key_benefits: ['A bundle of 6 toys specially selected for small to medium dogs—1 plush bungee giraffe, 1 plush squeaky monkey, 2 rope toys, 1 plush bone and 1 plush, squeaky ball.', 'Less guess, more play—this assortment of toys has been selected to meet your dog’s playtime needs with a variety of textures, sounds and materials.', 'More wag for your buck! You get 6 toys for more playtime fun, at a price worth bragging and wagging about.', 'Perfect for interactive play and games together to bond with your dog, and help keep him physically and mentally active.', 'Set of toys provides the mental stimulation dogs need. Always supervise your pup while playing to ensure safe, rewarding play.']
reviews: [I recently got a mini labradoodle and all of these toys have been a huge hit. I think this is a great puppy bundle for small to medium puppies. The ropes are very durable for my little pup. I would think a larger puppy may outgrow these faster then you'd like but it would still be a great bundle regardless just an fyi the toys are on the smaller side., I recently got a new pup and got this bundle. When it first arrived, I was actually missing half the toys (there’s supposed to be 6) I contacted Chewy immediately and I sent me another pack! My puppy’s favorite toy from this bundle is the rope with the tassel ends, giraffe, and bone., My Cavachon puppy LOVES every toy in this pack! When we first unpacked it, she couldn’t decide what to play with first and is taking turns trying them all out! She loves that the squeakers are smaller so she can squeak them herself!, Our new fur baby loves her toys we bought in this pack. The only one that won't is the big rope. it is three times as big as she is. So we will keep that for when she is much older, as she will only be 10-11 pounds full grown. Or it will be a gift to my grand-dogs. The orders from Chewy arrive quickly and as promised so far., Great price with a nice assortment! The plush toys are made for cuddler dogs not chewers but I am completely happy with the price and quality of the items recieved! I bought these for my pitbull puppy she loves her toys., My 12 week old corgi puppy is obsessed with all of these toys!!! Such a.good value set!!! Her favorites are the giraffe and the tug a war rope but she plays with all of them! So happy I got this!!, This pack of toys is so amazing my dog loves them he is 4 months old and is very crazy when comes to playing all toys are still in tact! The ropes are also great for chewing on incase his teeth hurt! He loves the giraffe because of the noise and they all still make noices!, These toys are great. The big rope pulled out of the wrap almost immediately but we just tied a knot at each end and works just fine. We were able to split the set between the big brother and baby sister perfectly. Now they just steal them from one another., My daughter just got a new puppy I wanted to send a welcome gift. My dog passed in March, Chewy has always been wonderful wanted to share this wonderful company with her., This pack would be best suited for smaller dogs or puppies. Most of the toys are no bigger than my hand. For the price, it would probably make a great starter pack for a new puppy owner.]

title: Planet Dog Orbee-Tuff Orbee Ball with Rope Tug Dog Toy, Blue/Green, Large
descriptions:
['Put a world of fun into your dog’s mouth with the Planet Dog Orbee-Tuff Orbee Ball with Rope Tug Dog Toy. Featuring an Orbee-Tuff ball attached to a rope, the award-winning design is destined to become a playtime favorite. Perfect for fetching, throwing, bouncing, chasing, tugging and gnawing, your dog will love all the endless ways to play. Plus, it’s made from eco-friendly materials that are totally free from chemicals like BPA and phthalates—so it’s totally safe for your dog to sink his teeth into. And with peppermint oil added to the material, it has an enticing minty scent.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Planet Dog
']
key_benefits: ["Rates a 5 out of 5 in durability on the Chew-o-meter, so it’s great for aggressive chewers, plus it's chewy, bouncy, buoyant and ultra-durable for excellent fetch, tug-of-war and water play!", 'Award-winning toy features a world of fun with an earth-inspired ball attached to a durable rope.', 'Made in the USA with eco-friendly materials and responsible manufacturing processes.', 'Pet-safe, non-toxic design is recyclable and free from latex, BPA, phthalates.', 'Material contains a small amount of essential peppermint oil for a great minty scent.']
reviews: [Ball is holding up but rope tears apart quickly and unravels leaving pieces dog can choke on, In less than a week our German Shepherd had the rope untied and out of the ball. We continued to re-tie the knot but it would not hold. In less than three weeks she was able to shred the rope so we threw out the rope and kept the ball., My dogs ripped all the green off of this ball in a matter of a few hours just playing fetch, not even chewing on it for fun. The rope also came off within two or three throws. I would say it would be a good toy for a dog who doesn't have a solid grip when they bite., American Bulldog tore threw rope within 24 hours, but the ball is fun, My dog loves this Orbee ball. He chewed thru the rope in just a few minutes. I expected it to last like longer., My 2 German Shepherds would like to say that the rope in this ball is total junk. They barely played with it and it frayed right away! I'm disappointed!!!, We had one previously that lasted months. This one lost a continent in an hour. I don't think they use the same quality of material as in years before. I'll have to pull the rest of the continents off before letting him have it again.]

title: Squishy Face Studio Fleece Tug Dog Toy
descriptions:
['If your dog loves tug of war, the Squishy Face Studio Fleece Tug Dog Toy is for him. Made from soft braided fleece, this toy is much safer than rope toys since there are no loose threads–and as an added benefit, this toy cleans your dog’s teeth while he chews. The 4-strand braided handle is comfortable to hold and the 8-strand braided mid-section makes this toy durable and lasting. When this tug is dirty, just throw it in the wash and it’s ready to be played with again!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Squishy Face Studio
']
key_benefits: ['Designed to be used on its own, or as a replacement for the Squishy Face Studio Super Tug Dog Toy.', 'Round handle end is comfortable to hold and the thick braid ensures durability.', 'Made with soft fleece which helps to clean your dog’s teeth while he plays and chews.', 'Braided fleece design is safer than rope toys which can fray and choke your dog.', 'Easy to care for, this tug toy can be thrown in the washing machine after a dirty day of play.']
reviews: [Yay! Great quality product. I ordered the blue combo, non squeaker version and it was exactly what I wanted. Fleece is gentle on dog’s teeth and very durable. The length is great for a 25lbs dog to play tug and retrieve with. This is thicker than the one that attaches to the flirt pole, so it may be good for dogs 20-50lbs with no problem. I wish these came in a variety of colors, since I like to color coat my dogs’ gear. Red, pink, hunter green would be so awesome!, My pitbull destroyed in 5 minutes. If you have a small dog or one who isn't an aggressive chewer, this would be a good toy., we have a Shih Tzu, this polar fleece type tug toy, works perfect for a fun play time. easy on the hands and on his mouth, My dogs loved this and chased each other around the house playing with it for about a week. I have two dogs, one about 50 pounds and one about 80 pounds. I was surprised by how long it lasted because it was very soft. It was one toy I didn’t mind on the bed. I think if I would have watched to make sure they were playing instead of just chewing it, it would have lasted a lot longer. I have found stronger power-chewer items, so I wouldn’t recommend it to a power chewer based on that description., My dog likes these toys and they hold up pretty good. Think they are priced a bit high for what it costs to make them., My 110lb Great Dane Saint Bernard mix chews through EVERY toy!! This one has lasted her almost three months and is just started to show some fraying in the top! Wear and tear because she like to put the ring in her mouth and chew on it! Will definitely be buying again once she breaks the one she has now! Wish they had more toys that were fleece like this one!, My Pittie is a playful guy. He was so excited for his toy but noticed in less than a hour he was able to tear it apart., I bought this as a reward toy while training. It's perfect for this! The size it just right as a reward tug and it's easy enough to stuff it in my back pocket until I need it again., Purchased this in December 2018 for my Pit, Bassett, Blue Healer mix. He has ripped every toy to shreds within days of having it. But here I sit 5 months later in awe that the toy is still in tact. He loves this toy and has not torn it to pieces yet. There's just one hole in it and a tiny fray in the rope. This is DEFINITELY a score for tough chewers. I just wish there was a toy that would keep him from eating my couch., Not long lasting or durable. Lasted less than an hour with our 3 yr old English Bulldog]

title: Multipet Doglucent TPR Dental Diamond Bone Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your furry companion is going to have a blast playing with Multipet’s Doglucent TPR Dental Diamond Bone Dog Toy! This colorful toy is sure to excite and entice your pup with its red, blue and yellow LED lights that activate with each bounce! It’s made of durable thermoplastic rubber (TPR) and has a textured surface that helps scrape away plaque and tartar as your furry friend plays. Paw-fectly suitable for nighttime and daytime play or interactive and supervised solo play, this toy is sure to keep your dog on his toes!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Multipet
']
key_benefits: ['Lights up with every bounce to capture your canine’s attention!', 'The bumpy surface helps support healthy teeth and gums.', 'Delivers a fun bounce to keep your pup on his toes.', 'Great for an interactive game of toss and fetch and supervised solo play.', 'Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) is easy to wipe down for a hassle-free clean.']
reviews: [This toy does NOT light up like it is supposed to! What a disappointment and waste of money... I bought this toy for my pup to have a toy to play with at night time seems we have a big back yard and this way we could see it. We also bought the ball and same thing it didn’t light up and the one side piece came off after he went and fetched it 3 times.... don’t waste your money on this product at all!!!, Lasted about 10 minutes iwth my 6 month lab, she played and had fun and then torn a chunk out of the black material., Held up pretty good with my dog chewing it. Bright lights are great for playing in the dark. Freddy really liked this toy. Good for his teeth also. Would reccomend, Bought this for my puppy that loves to chew. She chewed off pieces in a matter of minutes, Great toy for the price. My dog loves this toy and will play with it for hours! The durability is amazing.]
